texts.es: Nuris con su credikiva compr pescado de mar al por mayor y gan dinero porque manej buenos precios, Sus ventas han mejorado y esto ayuda al aumento de su nivel de vida. En la actualidad est revisando la propuesta de administrar un restaurante y est evaluando su rentabilidad. Con su credikiva nuevo comprar pescado nuevamente al pormayor, para aumentar una vez mas su capital de trabajo y servir las delicias que ella prepara con este producto en su negocio. Su meta es seguir adelante y siempre sumar. Su mensaje a los financiadores de Kiva es el siguiente:" Muchas bendiciones y que sigan apoyando a los microempresas de Colombia"
texts.en:
Nuris used her Kiva loan to buy ocean fish at wholesale and earned money because she managed good prices. Her sales have improved and this has increased her living standard. Shes currently looking over a proposal to open a restaurant and evaluating its profitability.
She will use her new Kiva loan to buy fish at wholesale again to increase her working capital once more and serve the delicious dishes she prepares with the fish in her business. Her goal is to continue forward and to add always. Her message to Kiva lenders is the following: Many blessings and may you continue helping micro businesses in Colombia.

loan.use: to buy fish at wholesale once more.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to purchase bags of flour and sugar to bake her bread for sale.

loan.name: Atta

texts.en: Atta is single parent and has one child. Atta is a hairdresser and owns a beauty salon in Ankako, which she has done for four years. Atta uses her income to feed herself and her child. Atta will use the loan to buy hair wigs and hair creams for her beauty shop. With the new profits, Atta wishes to expand her salon.

loan.use: buy hair wigs and hair creams

loan.name: Heisell Maria

texts.es: Heisell de 25 aos de edad es casada, trabaja como responsable de sucursal de la Cruz Lorena. Solicita su 4to crdito para comprar material didactico y para pagar mensualidad de ella y de su esposo en la Universidad URACCAN, ademas desea ayudar a su hermana con los gastos de bachillerato. Esta joven pareja ha sido muy responsable y bien trabajadores,han luchado juntos para obtener su propia vivienda. Su mayor sueo en la vida es que su esposo encuentre trabajo ya que ha quedado desempleado, culminar sus estudios universitarios y gozar de salud y que su familia permanezca unida.
texts.en:
Heisell, 25, is married and manages a Cruz Lorena branch office. Shes asking for her 4th loan to buy school supplies and to pay her and her husbands tuition at URACCAN University; she also wants to help with her sisters high school costs.
This young couple has been very responsible and hardworking; they have striven together to obtain their own house. Her greatest dream in life is that her husband finds employment since he is currently unemployed, to finish her university training, to enjoy good health and that her family stays together.

loan.use: to buy school supplies.

loan.name: Roberto

texts.es: El seor Roberto se dedica a la administracin de un bao publico de su propiedad, es cliente nuevo ser la primera secuencia de su crdito, es casado y no tiene hijos que dependen de el Sr. Roberto vive en casa propia y su negocio se encuentra en el mismo domicilio es trabajador ya que cuenta con varios negocios el prstamo lo invertir en la refaccin de los baos ya que por constante uso se deteriora y realizar el mantenimiento de su negocio, el esta muy feliz de ser beneficiado ya que se compromete en pagar puntualmente sus cuotas, es una persona muy trabajadora se levanta muy temprano para realizar la limpieza de los baos, se siente feliz por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Roberto runs public rest rooms that he owns. Hes a new client and this will be his first loan sequence. Hes married and has no dependent children. Roberto lives in his own house and his business is located there too. He is a worker in that he has several businesses. He will use the loan to repair the rest rooms which due to constant use wear down and to provide maintenance to his business. He is very happy to be benefitted and he commits to make his installment payments punctually. He is a very hardworking person who rises very early to clean the restrooms. He feels happy for the support provided.

loan.use: to service and maintain his public rest rooms.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: buy more palm fruit for the production of palm oil for sale

loan.name: Kua Kyrey Group

texts.es: El comit se denomina Kua Kyrey, estn en el Segundo Ciclo con 13 integrantes. Es un grupo conformado por personas muy unidas, solidarias y responsables. Ellas son mujeres muy trabajadoras y emprendedoras, cuyo objetivo es poder sacar adelante a sus hijos y familiares. Maria es la presidenta del grupo, ella se define como una mujer muy trabajadora y luchadora, que se esfuerza por darle lo mejor a su familia. Maria comenta que se dedica a la venta de todo tipo de prendas, como ser camisas, remeras, pantalones y dems tipos, gracias a lo cual ella puede ayudar a su familia y cubrir los gastos que da a da surgen. Ella solicita el crdito para la compra de prendas de verano para que de esa forma pueda surtirse y tener mayor variedad para ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
The committee is called Kua Kyrey and is in its second cycle with 13 members. Its a group composed of very united, supportive and responsible people. They are hardworking, enterprising women whose objective is to move their children and families ahead.
Mara is the group President. She defines herself as a hardworking, tenacious woman who strives to give the best to her family. Mara comments that she sells all kinds of clothes like shirts, t-shirts, pants and others. Thanks to this shes able to help her family and cover daily costs that arise.
She asks for the loan to buy summer clothes so that she can be stocked up and have a wider variety to offer her customers.

loan.use: to buy summer clothes to resell.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: To buy more fish and cassava which she will use to prepare her kokontey for sale

loan.name: Ama

texts.en: Ama is divorced and has three children. She cooks banku, cooked fermented corn dough and cassava dough, for sale. She serves it with fried fish, pepper and tomatoes sauce at Ankako. Ama has been doing this for three months now. She is responsible for taking care of the family. Her loan will be used to buy bags of maize and fish which she uses in preparing her banku for sale. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to mount a structure for the sale of her cooked banku and fish.

loan.use: to buy bags of maize and fish which she uses in preparing her banku for sale.

loan.name: Damaris Nohemi

texts.es:
Damaris de 25 aos de edad, labora como asesora pedagogica, es una joven emprendedora y muy trabajadora su esposo es comerciante y ademas se desempea como conductor, ambos son bien trabajadores y bien unidos, pues comparten con los gastos familares y los deberes crediticios.
Solicita financiamiento para pagar curso de titulacin y pago del titulo de la carrera Licenciatura en Ingles. Su sueo es culminar sus estudios universitarios para despues estudiar un post grado y asi ir profesionalizandose, siempre y cuando cuente con la ayuda de su esposo el cual siempre le apoya.
Cabe sealar que Damaris anteriormente fue beneficiada con kiva para la construccion de una habitacion en su casa por lo que les esta muy agradecida por la oportunidad que siempre brindan a las personas de escasos recursos, pues solo con los creditos es que podemos mejorar nuestras condiciones de vida y superarnos para que a nuestra familia tenga lo basico en la casa.
texts.en:
Damaris, 25, has worked for the Ministry of Education as a teaching assessor; shes demonstrated responsibility and love for her daily work. Shes a young hardworking, enterprising woman and her husband is a merchant who also works as a driver. They are both very hardworking and united because they share household expenses and loan obligations.
Shes asking for a loan to pay her graduation and professional title costs for her Bachelors in English at Martn Lutero University. Her dream is to complete her university training to then study a postgraduate course to increase her level of professionalism as long as she has her husbands help who always supports her.
Its worth mentioning that Damaris had a previous Kiva loan to build a room onto her house and she is very grateful for the opportunity they always give to people of scarce resources because its only with the loans that they can improve their living conditions and improve so that their families can have the basics at home.

loan.use: to pay for graduation and professional title costs.

loan.name: Ekua

texts.en: Ekua is married and has five children. Ekua produces palm oil for sale at Ankako, which she has done for four years. Her husband is a carpenter. Ekua uses her income to support her husband in paying their childrens school fees. Ekua will use the loan to buy more palm fruit to produce more palm oil for sale. With the new profit, Ekua will expand her business.

loan.use: To buy more palm fruit to produce more palm oil for sale

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to paint her house.

loan.name: Gladys Cecilia

texts.es: Gladys desde muy joven vea a su madre coser y de ella aprendi mucho de lo que hoy sabe hacer, porque ella mediante estudio perfeccion su arte especficamente en calado y bordado y actualmente defini su lnea de confecciones en el plano infantil. Su mayor riqueza es su creatividad con la que disea y trabaja los vestidos de nias especialmente. Con su negocio ha logrado apoyar el bienestar de su hogar, conformado por su esposo y sus 3 hijos en las edades de 30 a 33 aos. Su meta es seguir progresando y llegar a estructurar una unidad de negocios mas formalizada y con tecnologa que genere empleo. Mientras esto ocurre trabaja diariamente con gran esfuerzo, dinamismo y alegra, obteniendo una rentabilidad sobre las ventas no menor del 38,5%, sus inventarios rotan cada 30 das y sus cuentas por cobrar cada 12 das. En la actualidad est aplicando a su primer financiamiento a la Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo, con la cual comprar una fileteadora y materias primas e insumos de confeccin, para responde a su exigente clientela con el delicado acabado que solo ella puede ofrecer en su mercado.
texts.en:
From a very young age Gladys watched her mother sew and learned much of what she knows how to do today because through courses she perfected her art especially in openwork and embroidery. She has defined her line specifically in infant ware. Her greatest gift is her creativity with which she designs and manufactures dresses for little girls, especially.
With her business she has managed to support her homes wellbeing; it is composed of her husband and three children whose ages range between 30 and 33. Her goal is to continue making progress to reach a more formalized business structure with technology that will create jobs. While this happens, however, she works daily with much effort, dynamism and joy obtaining a profit margin of no less than 38.5% and a 30-day stock turnover rate; her accounts receivable are 12 days.
She is currently applying for her first loan from Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo that shell use to buy a serger sewing machine, raw materials and sewing supplies to respond to her demanding clientele with the delicate finishing touches that only she provides in her market.

loan.use: to buy serger sewing machine, raw materials and supplies.

loan.name: Jorge Antonio

texts.es:
El seor Jorge Antonio es soltero, tiene 20 aos de edad, es perito contador diplomado, se dedica a la sastrera, a la confeccin de camisas y pantalones, inici este negocio como operario y hasta el momento lleva 5 aos de experiencia.
Solicita un prstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de telas e hilos, de diferentes clases y colores para mejorar su produccin de tejidos, ya que espera tener un negocio con mejores ganancias.
texts.en: Jorge Antonio, 20, is single and a certified accounting expert. He works as a tailor; he makes shirts and pants. He started in this business as an employee and to date has five years experience. Hes asking for a loan to buy fabric and thread of various kinds and colors to improve his production of textiles since he hopes to have a more profitable business.

loan.use: to buy fabric and thread.

loan.name: Libertadores Group

texts.es: Un grupo con mucho optimismo y deseo de hacer negocio, es el grupo Libertadores, formado hace ya dos aos, cuenta con 7 integrantes los cuales dan fe que si se puede salir adelante a pesar de las adversidades. Muestra de ello es la seora Maria de 57 aos de edad, casada y con 7 hijos de los cuales seis son independientes y uno aun esta a su cuidado, ella se dedica a la venta de tuberculos en un puesto en el mercado de su zona hace 40 aos, Este negocio que le ha dado muchas satisfacciones como son la implementacin de muebles en el hogar y los estudios de sus hijos. con el reciente prstamo la seora Maria lo invertir en comprar de mas tuberculos y as poder tener mayores ingresos y estabilidad econmica en cuanto a los gastos del hogar. No puedo concluir sin antes mencionar el desempeo y el entusiasmo de cada integrante de los Libertadores para llegar a un objetivo en comn el cual es la estabilidad econmica para sus familias y el progreso de sus negocios.
texts.en:
One very optimistic group, with a desire to do business, is the Libertadores ("Liberators"). Formed two years ago, it consists of seven members who have faith that one can succeed in spite of adversity.
An example of that, Maria is 57 years old, married with seven children, six of whom are independent and one of whom remains in Maria's care. For 40 years, Maria has worked selling tubers (a type of plant) in a stall in the market in her area. This business has given her a lot of satisfaction, as it has provided for the furniture in her home and the schooling of her children.
With this loan, Maria will invest it in her business and purchase more tubers. This will allow her to increase her income and provide greater financial stability as to her household expenses.
I cannot conclude without mentioning the hard work and enthusiasm of each member of the Libertadores in achieving their common goals, which are financial stability for their families and the success of their businesses.

loan.use: to purchase tubers (a type of plant).

loan.name: Matilde

texts.es: Matilde de 62 aos, vive en el municipio de Soledad y tiene 2 hijos en las edades de 33 y 36 aos respectivamente. All mismo tiene un negocio, a travs del cual se dedica a la venta de mercancas variada y medicinas naturales, entre otros artculos que sus clientes le encargan y ella se los consigue, para que estos, en la comodidad de sus posibilidades econmicas le paguen a plazos pactados. Su negocio surgi cuando se separ de su esposo y debi buscar oportunidades de ingresos, para que su familia avanzara y tuvieran todos bienestar. Su meta es lograr el crecimiento de su negocio, para continuar con la satisfaccin de sus necesidades personales y convertir su negocio en una miscelnea, donde sus clientes, tan pronto lleguen identifiquen lo que les hace falta y le compren rpidamente, porque su propsito es minimizar la venta en la calle y salirle al paso a la competencia, que cada da se muestra con promociones exhibidas. En la actualidad est aplicando a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprar omega 3, lociones, perfumes propolio etc, artculos que basa en los pedidos de sus compradores y que aparecen en el mercado, con importantes descuentos en sta poca de un nuevo ao 2012.
texts.en:
Matilde is 62 years old, lives in the town of Soledad, and has two children aged 33 and 36 years old. She has a business, through which she sells various merchandise and herbal medicines, among other items that her clients request and that she acquires on their behalf. Due to the limited resources of her customers, they pay her over time according to set schedules.
Matilde's business increased when she separated from her husband and had to look for earning opportunities to provide for her family and allow it to advance. Her goal is to grow her business, so as to continue satisfying her personal expenses, and to convert her business into a general store where her customers could, upon arriving, identify what they need and purchase it quickly. She hopes to minimize street sales and outlast the competition, which displays promotions every day.
She is applying for her first KIVA loan, through the Foundation Mario Santo Domingo, which she will use to buy omega-3, lotions, perfumes, propolis (a resin with medicinal uses), and other products that are requested by her customers and appear in the market, with important discounts in this new year of 2012.

loan.use: to buy omega 3, lotions, perfumes, propolis, and natural medicines.

loan.name: Vidalia Del Socorro

texts.es: Doa Vidalia de 43 aos de edad, trabaja como docente de primaria en la Escuela Rafaela Herrera desde hace 26 aos, cuenta con el apoyo economico de su compaero de vida que trabaja como albail y le ayuda con los gastos familiares, segun referencias es muy responsable, Humilde y de buen vivir en su comunidad. solicita su 7mo crdito para terminar de construir una habitacin y asi tener mejores condiciones en su hogar y darle mas valor a su propiedad. su mayor sueo en la vida es que familia permanezca en los caminos de Dios y gozar de salu d y trabajo.
texts.en: Vidalia is 43 years old. For the past 26 years she has worked as a primary teacher in the Rafaela Herrera school. She has the economic support of her life partner, who works as mason and helps with the family's expenses. According to references she is very responsible, humble and has a good reputation in the community. She is requesting a seven month loan to finish the construction of a bedroom. This will improve the living conditions in her home and increase the property value. Her biggest dream in life is for her family to remain in the way of the Lord and enjoy good health and work.

loan.use: to finish building a room

loan.name: Evaristo

texts.es: Evaristo, de 43 aos, esta casado con Aurea de 37 aos y tienen 04 hijos y cuentan con su propia casa donde ronda la felicidad. Desde muy nio sus padres le inculcaron a trabajar en la chacra, hoy es campesino y cuenta con un terreno donde cultiva plantas de cacao. Viene trabajando 15 aos en sus propias tierras, En tiempos de cosecha cuenta con el apoyo de sus hijos y de los jornaleros para as avanzar con mayor rapidez con las extracciones de los frutos. Lo que ms le gusta de su trabajo es cosechar los frutos de las plantas; ya que as siente que los meses de arduo trabajo le brindan como recompensa la calidad de sus frutos. Considera que lo ms difcil es transportar sus productos desde la chacra hasta los centros de acopio ubicados en la ciudad de san francisco; lugar donde le ofrecen mejores precios por sus granos y frutos de pia. Su dificultad es no poder contar con suficiente ingreso econmico para solventar los pagos por adelantado a los jornaleros quienes le brindan el apoyo con las cosechas; es por ello que acude a los prstamos que facilita la Institucin MFP. Pero ahora lo que ms prioriza es sembrar ms plantas de cacao ya que cuenta con 01 hectrea de terreno no cultivado. Este ser el crdito nmero 01 con MFP, siente que el dinero del crdito le ayudar mucho en el progreso de su trabajo. En su banco comunal es un socio muy querido por el resto de sus compaeros, ya que es muy solidario con ellos. Con los 1,500 nuevos soles; comprar plantas de cacao para amplir la produccin.
texts.en: Evaristo is 43 years old, he is married to Aurea, who is 37 years old. Together they have 4 children. They have their own house where they live happily. Since he was a child his parents taught him to work on the farm, now he is a farmer and he has his own land where he grows cocoa trees. He has been working his own land for the past 15 years. During harvest times he has help from his children and other hired laborers to be able to pick the fruit more quickly. What he likes most about his work is harvesting his plants because he can see that his months of hard work have resulted in the reward of good fruit. The hardest thing is to transport his products from the farm to the warehouse that is located in the city of San Francisco; this is where he is able to get the best price for his grains and pineapples. His difficulty is that he does not have enough economic income to be able to cover the advance payments to the hired laborers that help him during the harvest. It is for this reason that he came to the institution of MFP. But right now what is of higher priority is to plant more cocoa trees in a hectare of uncultivated land that he has. This will be his first loan with MFP. Evaristo feels that the money from this loan will help him greatly in the progress of his work. In his community bank he is a member that is very well liked by the rest of the members; he is well integrated with them. With the loan of 1,500 nuevos soles he is going to buy cocoa trees, which will increase his production.

loan.use: to buy cocoa plants

loan.name: Evelyne

texts.en:
Evelyne is 27 years old. She is married and has three children. One of her children attends school.
Evelyne sells sportswear garments and has been running this business for four years. With the loan she will buy more sports garments to sell.
She plans to use the profits to pay school fees for her child. Evelyne dreams of having a sports garments store in the future.

loan.use: to buy more sports garments to sell.

loan.name: Zoila Rosa

texts.es: Zoila de 24 aos fue educada por su madre con mucha responsabilidad y valores morales en los que enmarca su vida, pues al quedar hurfana vio como su madre los sac adelante y la llev a lograr su licenciatura en matemticas. Zoila contrajo matrimonio en el ao 2009 con su novio licenciado en idiomas, y trabajan mediante contratos profesionales en instituciones educativas, adems de ser los propietarios de una panadera ubicada al suroccidente de la ciudad de Barranquilla, negocio que crearon para fortalecer los ingresos y planear su futuro con mayor xito. En la actualidad est planeando Zoila acceder a un credikiva con el cual comprar materias primas e insumos como harina, queso, huevos en mayores proporciones y de contado, con el cual planean incrementar su capital de trabajo y ganar descuentos por las caractersticas de su compra lo que supone una inversin muy exitosa, porque conocen muy bien su negocio y gozan de la aceptacin y del cario de su clientela ubicada a sus alrededores y que en general son tiendas ubicadas en diversos barrios del sector.
texts.en:
Zoila, age 24, was raised by her mother with much responsibility and the moral values that have defined her life. Upon becoming motherless she saw how her mother got them ahead and led her to obtain her degree in mathematics.
Zoila married her fianc in the year 2009. He has a degree in languages, and they work through professional contracts at educational institutions. They are also the owners of a bakery in the southwestern part of the city of Barranquilla. They created this business to enhance their income and to plan their future with greater success.
Zoila is currently planning to get a Kiva loan. She will use the loan to buy raw materials and supplies like flour, cheese and eggs. She will buy in greater quantities and for cash. She plans to increase her working capital and to get discounts for the terms of her purchases. She imagines that the investment will be very successful because they know their business very well. They enjoy the recognition and affection of their customers in the surrounding areas. Generally speaking there are stores in the different neighborhoods of the sector.

loan.use: to buy supplies like flour, cheese, and eggs in greater quantities for cash.

loan.name: Rebecca

texts.en:
Rebecca is 24 years old, married, and has one child who is two and a half years old. Her husband works as a businessman.
Rebecca has been selling clothes for the past three years. She has requested the loan to buy more clothes to sell.
With the profits, she plans to start saving for her childs education.

loan.use: to buy more clothes to sell.

loan.name: Melinda Rocio

texts.es: La seorita Melinda es una joven emprendedora que se dedica a la confeccin de prendas de vestir, que vive con sus 2 hermanos y su madre a quienes s ayuda con los gastos del hogar, ya que esta es su nica actividad para poder ayudar en la economa de su hogar, ella se dedica a la confeccin de vestidos para nias y para mayores hace ya 2 aos, con el crdito tiene pensado comprar telas, cintas, encajes y para poder realizar unos trabajo para las oficinas ya que tiene muchos pedidos por esta temporada y as poder aumentar su capital y sus ingresos de su familia, con el tiempo ampliar su negocio y culminar sus estudios.
texts.en:
Seorita Melinda is a young entrepreneur, who works making clothing items. She lives with her two brothers and her mother, whom she helps with the household expenses. This is her only activity that allows her to help with the household finances.
She has been working sewing clothes for children and for adults for the last two years. With the loan she intends to purchase fabric, ribbons and lace, so that she can do some work for the offices from which she gets many orders at this time of year. In this way she can increase her capital and her family's income, and with time she can expand her business and complete her studies.

loan.use: to purchase materials for making clothing: fabric and thread

loan.name: Esperance

texts.en:
Esperance is 31 years old. She has four children between the ages of nine months and 13 years.
Esperance has been making clothes for the past three years. She is a tailor.
With the loan, she will buy more fabrics and thread for making clothes. She plans to use the profits for making savings.

loan.use: to buy more fabrics and thread so she can make more clothes to sell.

loan.name: Anonymous Group
loan.use: to pay college fees to pursue further studies.

loan.name: Lilian Ruth

texts.es: La Sra. Lilian esta sacando otro credito con la institucion, ella tiene como actividad la atencin de un Saln de belleza indica que tiene experiencia de 5 aos en esta actividad su saln se encuentra en la zona Oquendo donde realiza distintos tipos de trabajos como ser cortes de cabello, bases, tintes, manicure, pedicura y otros; vive en casa familiar su domicilio se encuentra en el noroeste de la ciudad de Cochabamba en la zona Hipdromo; tiene 2 hijos su esposo es transportista la seora indica que con su actividad genera ingresos para su familia para el estudio y manutencin; el dinero que se le otorga es para la compra de productos cosmticos y mejoramiento de los ambientes de su peluquera, esta agradecida con la institucin por el apoyo brindado, ya que gracias a la institucin creci en su actividad.
texts.en:
Seora Lilian is looking for another loan from this financial institution. Her business is running a beauty salon. She indicates that she has five years of experience in this activity. Her salon is located in the Oquendo area, where she she undertakes various types of work such as hair cuts, styling, color, manicures, pedicures, and other things.
She lives in the family home, which is located to the north-east of the city of Cochabamba, in the Hipdromo area. She has 2 children and her husband is a trucker. She states that her business generates income to support her family and for education.
The money being provided to her is for the purchase of cosmetic products and for improving her beauty salon .
She is grateful to the lending institution for the help provided, as thanks to this institution she has been able to grow her business.

loan.use: to purchase cosmetic products and make improvements in her beauty salon.

loan.name: Sia Agatha's Group

texts.en:
We introduce to you in the photo above teachers of a primary school situated in Koidu/Kono, a city in eastern Sierra Leone. Like their teacher colleagues in other regions of the country, they have requested a loan of 6,500,000 Sierra Leonean Leones from Salone Microfinance Trust (SMT), a partner of Kiva.org based in Makeni, which is in northern Sierra Leone. With this loan, they will be able to meet their immediate financial challenges. At the end of each month, they will repay the loan using their monthly salaries.
The leader of this group of teachers is Sia, who was born in Seidu Nimikoro in eastern Sierra Leone. The 45 year old is married to a teacher, and the couple has four children together. Two are in secondary school and two are in primary school. With 25 years of experience in the teaching profession, Sia is requesting this loan in order to pay school fees for her children.

loan.use: to pay school fees for her children.

loan.name: Desmond Massuba's Group

texts.en:
Salone Microfinance Trust (SMT), a partner of Kiva.org based in Makeni, is very pleased to present to you this group of teachers from Koidu, a city in eastern Sierra Leone. They have come to SMT/Kiva lenders to seek a loan of 5,600,000 SLL in order to meet their immediate financial challenges. At the end of each month, they will repay the loan using their monthly salaries.
Desmond is the leader of this group of teachers. Desmond was born in Jaima Sewafeh in eastern Sierra Leone. He is fifty-six years old and married to a nurse. The couple has three children together. Two are in college and the other is not of school-going age. Desmond has been a teacher for twenty-seven years. He has requested this loan in order to pay college fees both for his children and for himself in order to pursue further studies.

loan.use: to pay college fees both for his children and for himself to pursue further studies.

loan.name: Anonymous Group
loan.use: to buy house building materials for the construction of a family house.

loan.name: Marie Solange

texts.en: Marie Solange is 24. She is married with three children aged between one month and six years. The oldest child attends school. She wants a loan to buy equipment for her salon, such as shampoo, dryers and mirrors. Marie Solange has spent three years running this business. With the profits, she will renovate her house.

loan.use: to buy more salon equipment.

loan.name: Anonymous Group
loan.use: to buy starch, cheese, lard, anise, and other ingredients.

loan.name: Jos

texts.es: Jos de 66 aos de edad ofrece servicios electrnicos en vehculos de mantenimiento y reparacin. l desarroll su experiencia de trabajo como auxiliar de mecnica y electromecnica, durante 6 aos, porque fue empleado de una empresa, de donde naci su propio negocio, qued cesante y decidi dedicarse manera independiente a ello. Su negocio funciona en un espacio subarrendado de un parqueadero en un punto de gran concurrencia vehicular; l se ha hecho muy conocido por los propietarios de vehculos que guardan sus vehculos mientras trabajan o hacen diligencias en el centro de la ciudad, la zona mas concurrida comicialmente de Barranquilla. Con sus ingresos genera bienestar a sus hijos y apoya a su familia tambin y esto para l es muy importante. En la actualidad est aplicando a su primer credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo, con el comprar repuestos y algunas herramientas como tester, y extensiones elctricas, muy necesarias para su buen desempeo, con lo que ofrecer un mejor servicio a sus clientes. El maneja una rentabilidad sobre sus ventas no menor del 42% y con sus crditos planea aumentarla, comprando de contado y buscando el incremento de su clientela a quien atiende con muchos deseos de ofrecerle la solucin que ellos requieren.
texts.en:
Jos, who is 66 years old, offers electronic services for vehicle maintenance and repairs. He developed his job experience as a mechanic and elecromechanic's assistant. He was employed by a company for 6 years, from which his own company was born. He lost his job and decided to do the job independently. His business functions in a sublet space in a parking lot where there is great vehicular traffic. He has become very well known by the car owners that keep their cars in the area while they work or that run errands in the center of the city, Barranquilla's most crowded commercial zone.
With his income, he provides wellbeing for his children, and he supports his family as well. For him, this is very important. He is currently applying for his first Kiva loan, the first loan that Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo is making. With the loan, he will buy spare parts and some tools that are very necessary for his good performance such as a [battery] tester and extension cords. He will offer better service to his customers with these items. He earns a profit above his costs that is no less that 42%. He plans to increase his profits with the loan by paying cash and looking to increase the number of customers that he serves with high desires of offering them the solution that they need.

loan.use: to buy spare parts and some tools like a [battery] tester and extension cords.

loan.name: Anonymous Group
loan.use: to buy building materials for the construction of a family house.

loan.name: Domithile

texts.en: Domithile is 40 years old. She has five children, three of whom are enrolled in school. Domithile sells food products, and she has been running this business for seven years. She has requested a loan to buy items such as beans and sorghum to sell. She plans to save the profits. In the future, Domithile would like to own a store.

loan.use: to buy additional food items to sell.

loan.name: Ernestine

texts.en: Ernestine is 47 years old. She has five children aged between eight and twenty. Four of them attend school. Her husband works as a farmer. Ernestine has been selling clothes for the past three years. She has requested a loan to buy more clothes to sell. She will save the profits. In the future, she would like to have a market stall in the city.

loan.use: to buy more clothes to sell.

loan.name: Jhonny

texts.es: El sr. Jhonny vive en la zona norte de la ciudad de Cochabamba, vive en la casa de sus padres con su familia que integra de sus dos hijos ya que esta separada de la esposa que por cuestin de trabajo esta de viaje el Sr. tiene un taller de carpintera el tiene su taller hace mas de 2 aos y hasta la fecha le va muy bien, no tiene crdito alguno en ninguna institucin financiera, en este momento solicita el prstamo para la compra de madera ya que para fin de ao tiene pensado exponer sus muebles en el taller que tiene un pequea tienda motivo por el cual se solicita el financiamiento para la compra de madera para la fabricacin de estos muebles, el sr. Jhonny es una persona muy trabajadora y muy amable, con el futuro desea poder tener una tienda mas grande y poder vender sus muebles a distintas ciudades y poder entregar por mayor segn pedidos.
texts.en:
Jhonny lives in the north area of the city of Cochabamba. He lives in his parents' house, with his family, which consists of his two sons, as he is living apart from his wife, who is away due to work.
He has a carpentry workshop, which he has had for more than two years, and up to now, it has gone very well for him.
He has not had a loan with any financial institution. At this time, he is applying for a loan to purchase wood, as by the end of the year, he is planning to display his furniture at his workshop, which has a small store area. For this reason, he is applying for the loan to buy wood for making this furniture.
Jhonny is a very hard-working person and very friendly. In the future he wishes to have a larger store, sell his furniture in various cities, and be able to fill wholesale orders.

loan.use: To buy equipment and wood.

loan.name: Jose Marcelino

texts.es: Jos, vive junto a su esposa y su hija en casa propia, l se dedica hace tres aos a su negocio de panadera elaborando pan dulce y francs, aprendi en una panadera y ahora su negocio es propio, trabaja todos los das de lunes a domingo. El prstamo lo necesita para comprar una batidora para el pan y otros materiales como: harina, levadura, azcar teniendo toda la materia prima podr obtener mejor produccion y las ganancias sern mejores cada da. El sueo de Jos es mantener su negocio estable y con el tiempo tener una panadera grande y en lo personal quiere satisfacer las necesidades de su familia.
texts.en:
Jos lives with his wife and daughter in their own house. He has worked in his bakery business for three years, making sweet bread and French bread. He learned his trade in a bakery, and now has his own business. He works every day from Monday to Sunday.
He needs the loan to buy a mixer for the bread, and ingredients such as flour, yeast, and sugar. By having all the raw materials, he will be able to produce more, and the earnings will be better every day.
Jos's dream is to keep his business going, and in time to have a large bakery. On the personal side, he wants to meet his family's needs.

loan.use: To buy a mixer, flour, yeast, and sugar.

loan.name: Anonymous Group
loan.use: to buy materials like corrugated sheets, bags of cement, rods, nails, etc. for the construction of a family house

loan.name: Theresa Kumba's Group

texts.en:
Pictured above are a group of teachers from the eastern city of Koidu/Kono. They have come to SMT, a partner of Kiva based in Makeni city, in northern Sierra Leone to apply for a loan of 7,800,000.00 SLL. With the help of this loan, they will be able to solve their immediate financial needs and then gradually repay the loan, using their monthly salaries.
Theresa is the leader of this group of teachers. Born in Koidu city, in eastern Sierra Leone, the fifty-two-year-old is married and has five children who are in college. Theresa has been a professional teacher for twenty-two years. She has applied for this loan in order to pay college fees for her children.

loan.use: to pay college fees for her children

loan.name: San Marcos Group

texts.es: San Marcos fue denominado el comit y actualmente se encuentran en el 6 ciclo del programa de mujeres emprendedoras de la fundacin paraguaya, con 11 integrantes. Son seoras muy activas y reconocidas en el barrio por el trabajo en equipo y por la unin. La Sra Julia es una de las seoras que plenamente se dedica a su trabajo para cumplir con sus obligaciones su actividad de todos los das se basa en tejer colchas en su propia casa y por medio de este trabajo ha logrado mantener a su familia. Ella nos dice que todo lo que hace es por darle un estilo de vida diferente a todos los suyos. Ella solicita el crdito para la compras de hilos, agujas, colorantes y dems, los cuales siempre utiliza para sus tejidos. Ella cuenta que ve en Kiva y fundacin paraguaya una gran oportunidad para poder progresar.
texts.en:
The San Marcos communal bank, with 11 members, is currently in its 6th loan cycle with the Fundacin Paraguayas Program for Enterprising Women. The members of this bank are very active women, well known in the neighborhood for their unity and team work. Sra. Julia is a member who is fully dedicated to her work and to meeting her obligations. She spends every day weaving bedspreads in her home and has succeeded in supporting her family with this work. She tells us that everything she does is to provide a different life style for them.
Julia is requesting a loan to purchase yarn, needles, dyes and other items that she always uses in her woven goods. She explains that she sees in KIVA and Fundacin Paraguaya a great opportunity for her to succeed.

loan.use: to purchase yarn, needles, dyes and other supplies for her weaving.

loan.name: Tamba Joseph's Group

texts.en:
Pictured above is a group of teachers from the eastern city of Koidu/Kono. They have come to SMT, a partner of Kiva based in Makeni city, in northern Sierra Leone, to apply for a loan of 7,000,000.00 SLL. With the help of this loan, they will be able to solve their immediate financial needs and then gradually repay the loan, using their monthly salaries.
Their leader is Tamba. Born in Njagbwema Fiama, in eastern Sierra Leone, the fifty-three-year-old is married and has seven children two in primary school, three in secondary school and two grownups. Tamba has been a professional teacher for twenty-eight years. He has applied for this loan in order to buy corrugated metal sheets to roof his house.

loan.use: to buy corrugated metal sheets to roof his house

loan.name: Maria Dominga

texts.es: Mara, tiene 39 aos de edad vive con su esposo y dos hijos en casa familiar, ella tiene una granja de pollos de engorde hace 4 aos el oficio lo aprendi de su suegra el cual le dedica todo el tiempo completo, por eso no tiene un horario establecido. El prstamo lo utilizara para comprar pollos de un da de nacidos para engordarlos y concentrado para su alimentacin, vacunas contra alguna enfermedad, de esa forma el negocio estar en buenas condiciones y podr obtener en un futuro las ganancias necesarias para el sostenimiento de su familia. La aspiracin de Mara es que sus hijos estudien y sean independientes, tener vivienda propia y aumentar en la granja de pollos para que sus ganancias sean mejores.
texts.en:
Mara is 39 and lives with her husband and two children in the familial home. She has had a chicken farm raising broilers for 4 years. She learned the task from her mother-in-law and devotes full-time to it so she does not have a set schedule.
She will utilize the loan to buy day-old chicks to fatten as well as concentrate for feeding and vaccines against disease. In this way her business will be on solid ground and she will be able to make the necessary profit to support her family in the future.
Maras aspirations are for her children to get an education and become independent, to have her own residence and to expand her chicken farm in order to increase her income.

loan.use: to buy day-old chicks, concentrate and vaccines.

loan.name: Josephine

texts.en: Josephine is 30 years old. She has owned a food stall for the past year. She wants the loan to buy more foodstuffs such as sugar and rice to sell. She will use the profits to renovate her house. In the future, Josephine dreams to own a shop.

loan.use: To buy more food to sell.

loan.name: Jesusa

texts.es: Jesusa, de 54 aos, es una mujer alegre y trabajadora, vive en su propia casa junto a su esposo Hugo de 37 aos y fruto de ese amor concibieron 01 hija Ruth de 20 aos, a quien desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. Los arduos trabajos que realiza Jesusa junto a su pareja en su chacra, han hecho que sus cultivos estn muy bien cuidados y que los das de venta sus productos sean rpidamente comprados. Su principal fuente de ingreso, es la venta de cacao, teniendo en total 06 cuadras de terreno. Los frutos de sus plantas los vende en la ciudad de San Francisco y en tiempos de cosecha contrata jornaleros y de esa manera avanza con mayor celeridad en las extracciones de sus frutos. Llleva 45 aos realizando esta actividad y considera que lo ms difcil es cuidar sus cultivos de las plagas que atacan sin piedad los primeros brotes de sus cultivos, es por ello que con el crdito solicitado comprar insecticidas para combatir la plaga. Con el tiempo, desea adquirir nuevas tierras, para ampliar sus cultivos. Este ser el crdito nmero 06 con MFP, ha sido muy puntual en sus anteriores crditos y trabaja sin causar problemas a su banco comunal. Con los 3,000 nuevos soles; comprar plantas de cacao para incrementar en su parcela.
texts.en:
Jesusa is 54 years old. She is a happy and hardworking woman. She lives in her own house with her husband for 37 years, Hugo, and from the fruit of that love was conceived a daughter, Ruth who is 20 years old and she wants to provide her with a better quality of life.
Jesusa works hard in the field with her husband, and they have cultivated crops that are well cared for, and their crops are bought quickly on sales days.
Her main source of income is the sale of cocoa, and she has a total of about 9 acres of land. The fruit of her plants are sold in the city of San Francisco and during harvest time they contract laborers and in this way they can advance quickly while harvesting the fruit.
She has been doing this work for 45 years and she considers the most difficult thing about it is to keep the pests away from her crops that attack without pity the first shoots of her crops. This is why she is asking for a loan to buy insecticides to fight the pests. Over time, she wants to procure new land in order to increase her crops.
This will be her 6th loan through MFP. She has been very punctual in her previous loans and she works without causing problems in the communal bank.
With the 3,000 soles she will buy cocoa plants to grow on her land.

loan.use: to buy cocoa plants

loan.name: Felicitee

texts.en: Felicitee is 50 years old. She is married to a businessman. She has 4 children between the ages of 22 and 32 all of them married. She has run a stall for the past two years. Felicitee has requested the loan to buy items such as soaps; cooking oil and flour to sell. With the profits she plans to make savings. In the future, Felicitee plans to have a shop.

loan.use: To buy more shop items for sell.

loan.name: Alcira Isabel

texts.es: Alcira est preparndose para recibir un nuevo credikiva y est muy satisfecha, porque compr de contado materias primas e insumos para fabricar nuevos diseos. Su nuevo crdito, lo invertir en la compra de telas, e hilos al por mayor con ello lograr aumentar aun mas su produccin y optimizar los costos generando mayores ganancias y este es justamente su plan. Su mensaje a los financiadores der Kiva es el siguiente: les agradezco de todo corazn la ayuda prestada que me han brindado y espero me sigan apoyando.
texts.en: Alcira is preparing to receive a new Kiva loan and is very happy because she bought on installment the basic materials and supplies in order to make new designs. The new loan will be used to buy fabric and thread at wholesale price with which she can successfully increase her production and maximize value and generate higher earnings and this is her exact plan. Her message to the Kiva funders is as follows, I thank them with all my heart for the help given to me and I hope that they continue to support me.

loan.use: to buy fabric and thread

loan.name: Sylvie

texts.en: Sylvie, age 36, is married to a carpenter. They have seven children and all of them go to school. Sylvie has been selling sorghum for one and a half years. She has requested this loan to buy more sorghum to sell. Sylvie is planning to use the profits that will be obtained from the business for savings.

loan.use: to buy more sorghum to sell.

loan.name: San Roque Group

texts.es: El comit denominado San Roque es de la ciudad de Concepcin, cuenta con diez y siete integrantes en donde todas tienen una pequea activada a la cual se dedique por mas pequea que sea las seoras se sienten muy emocionadas, la ayuda mutua entre ellas es constante y por sobre todo las inspira las ganas de seguir luchando por sus familias. Mercedes en una mujer muy emprendedora y trabajadora, ella se dedica a la venta de ropas, y nos comenta que al principio empez desde muy abajo, es decir, solo hacia ventas pequeas, pero despus fue creciendo y ahora ya tiene una clientela bien definida. Su meta es seguir trabajando de la misma forma en lo ha estado haciendo para poder seguir creciendo. Ella solicita el crdito para la compra de prendas de verano, como ser bermudas, camisillas, vestidos, soleritas y dems prendas, con las cuales podr surtirse.
texts.en:
The San Roque committee has seventeen members in the city of Concepcin and all have a small business. Despite being small businesses the women are very excited about them and help each other. They are persevering and inspire the others to continue struggling for their families.
Mercedes is a hardworking and entrepreneurial woman who sells clothing. She tells us that she started very small with only a few sales but then it began growing and now she has a good customer base. Her goal is to continue working in the same way that she has been doing to be able to continue expanding. She requests a loan to supply her business with summer clothing such as Bermuda shorts, shirts, dresses, skirts, and other clothing.

loan.use: to buy summer clothing to sell later

loan.name: Ruth Maria

texts.es: Ruth emprendi su negocio fundamentada en la experiencia que adquiri con su sobrino; esto la llev a tener sus ingresos independientes con los cuales ha sostenido su hogar hoy conformado por ella y sus dos hijos en las edades de 27 y 28 aos. La venta de comidas, es tradicional en su familia y el arte de la preparacin de comidas rpidas le pareci a Ruth, muy til y rentable adems de prctico para replicarlo. Ella vende en las horas de la noche y especialmente los das festivos, momentos en los cuales se incrementan sus ventas. En la actualidad est aplicando a su primer credikiva, tambin primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprar embutidos, salsa, veduras y un horno microondas; entre sus deliciosos productos, se encuentran las hamburguesas, los perros calientes, salchipapas y combinaciones que ella misma ha inventado con el propsito de que agrade a su clientela y lograr con ello fidelizarla.
texts.en: Ruth undertook her primary business after gaining experience with her nephew. She learned how to keep her earnings separate from the ones that sustain her household. Her household is comprised of her two children, ages 27 and 28, and herself. Selling prepared food is a tradition in her family. The art of preparing food quickly is very useful and profitable for Ruth. With practice she is able to do it better. She sells prepared food in the evening and on festival days. On these days she can increase her sales. She is actually applying for her first loan with KIVA. This is also her first loan with the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation. With this loan she will buy sausages, salsa, vegetables and a microwave oven. Among the delicious food she prepares are hamburgers, hot dogs, potato chips and food items that she invented with the help of her loyal customers.

loan.use: to buy sausages, salsa, vegetables and a microwave oven.

loan.name: Carlos Orlando

texts.es: Carlos, vive con su esposa y dos hijos de 18 y 23 aos de edad, es empleado y adems atiende una granja de cerdos, su trabajo es en la alcalda municipal, como barrendero, el horario es de 4:00am a 12:00md, todos los das de lunes a viernes, los fines de semana se dedica a atender la granja y durante la semana despus de su trabajo. Actualmente est solicitando un prstamo para la compra de 3 terneros, para la crianza, ya que tiene la oferta de venta y le ayudara para aumentar la granja. Este prstamo le ayudara para fortalecer el negocio y que su familia este ms segura de esta actividad econmica; La aspiracin de Carlos es que sus hijos estudien, poco a poco ir apoyndoles para que salgan adelante.
texts.en: Carlos lives with his wife and two children who are 18 and 23 years old. He is employed and also attends to a pig farm. His job is in the local mayor's office as a janitor. His schedule is from 4 am to 12 noon, Monday through Friday. On the weekends, and during the week after his job, he attends to the farm. He is currently asking for a loan to purchase three new calves to raise, since he already has a sales offer. It will help him to grow the farm. This loan will help him to strengthen his business. This economic activity will also help his family to be more secure. Carlos' dream is that his children study. Little by little he continues to support them so that they move ahead.

loan.use: to buy three calves.

loan.name: Patricie

texts.en: Patricie is 54 years old. She is a widow with 15 children. Three of them go to school and the others dont attend school due to financial problems. She sells sorghum, which she has been doing for the past 5 years. With this loan, she will buy more sorghum to sell. She plans to use the profits to buy home domestic products. In the future, she dreams of having a stock of foodstuffs.

loan.use: to buy sorghum

loan.name: Prudencio

texts.es: Prudencio, de 44 aos de edad, vive separado de su pareja, tiene 02 hijos Yuri de 22 aos y Joel de 17 aos; vive en su propia casa y se esmera por sacar adelante a sus hijos. La labor que realiza prudencio es labrar la tierra, donde cultiva plantas de cacao. Es conocedor del arduo trabajo que se realiza en el campo agrcola; donde viene trabajando 30 aos en sus propias tierras, en tiempos de cosecha cuenta con el apoyo de sus hijos y jornaleros quienes se encargan de cosechar y trasladar los productos recolectados hasta cierto tramo para luego ser transportados con vehculos menores. Se siente muy comprometido con su trabajo; porque gracias a su esfuerzo cotidiano hoy disfruta al ver que sus plantas le dn una buena produccin. Cuenta que la estacin de invierno no es de su agrado porque son meses donde abundan mayor cantidad de insectos y precipitaciones de lluvia, perjudicando sus campos florales. Con el crdito solicitado comprar ms semillas de pia para expandir sus sembros. Este es el crdito numero 11 con MFP, sabe que si lo paga a tiempo, podr acceder a otro prstamo con mayor tranquilidad y sin traerle complicaciones a su banco comunal donde es muy estimado por el resto de los integrantes. Con los 1,000 nuevos soles, comprar productos qumicos, abono para hacer el mantenimiento de sus cultivos.
texts.en: Prudencio, who is 44 years old, lives separate from his partner. He has two children. Yuri is 22 years old, and Joel is 17 years old. Prudencio lives in his own house and tries very hard to provide a better life for his children. Prudencio works as a farmer, where he cultivates cocoa plants. He works very hard on the farming field. He has been working for 30 years on his own land. During the planting season, he counts on the support of his children and day laborers who see to the planting and move the collected products to a certain place so that later in can be transported with small vehicles. He feels very dedicated to his work. Thanks to his daily effort, today he enjoys seeing his plants give him a good crop. He says that he does not like the winter season because there is a large quantity of insects and rain during those months, damaging his floral fields. With the loan that he is asking for, he will buy more pineapple seeds to expand his sown fields. This is his 11th loan with MFP. He knows that if he pays it on time, he will be able to obtain another loan with greater ease and will not bring complications to his communal bank where he is well-liked by the rest of the members. With the 1,000 nuevos soles, he will buy chemical and fertilizer products to maintain his crops.

loan.use: to buy chemical and fertilizer products to maintain his plants.

loan.name: San Luis Group

texts.es: 12 mujeres de la ciudad de San Lorenzo se han unido con el propsito de trabajar juntas y ayudarse las unas a las otras a mejorar sus estilos de vida. Ellas son mujeres muy trabajadoras y emprendedoras, que trabajan todos los das desde muy tempranas horas del da y vuelven ya muy tarde. Las miembros ven en el programa de la fundacin paraguaya una gran ayuda para poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida. Teresa es una de las integrantes del grupo y ella nos cuenta que se dedica a la venta de comidas d todo tipo, nos dice que le va muy bien puesto que ella tiene muy buena manos para la cocina y evidencia de ella es la cantidad de clientes que tiene, lo cual la ayuda mucho con con los gastos de manutencin de la casa y de la familia. Su meta es tener un gran comedor donde poder vender los platillos que prepara. Ella solicita el crdito para la compra de carne, verduras, hortalizas, condimentos y dems insumos que necesite para elaborar sus alimentos.
texts.en: 12 women from the city of San Lorenzo have united with the purpose of working together and helping one another to improve their way of life. They are very hardworking and enterprising women. They work very hard every day from very early in the morning until very late. The members see the Fundacin Paraguay program as a great help in being able to better their life conditions. Teresa is one of the members of the group. She tells us that she sells foods of all kinds. She says that it is going very well for her since she has very good hands in the kitchen. This is evidenced by the quantity of customers that she has, which helps her a lot with the cost of maintaining her home and family. Her goal is to have a big dining room where she will be able to sell the dishes that she prepares. She is asking for the loan to buy meat, vegetables, condiments, and other foods that she needs to make her dishes.

loan.use: to buy meat, vegetables, condiments, and other foods.

loan.name: Evelyn Scarlet

texts.es: Evelyn Scarlet es una emprendedora que la actividad econmica a la que se dedica a brindar los servicios de video juegos en el cual lo tiene ubicado en su casa de habitacin, ella es clienta de Fundacin Len se le ha brindado financiamiento para el negocio en el cual nos expresa que le ha ayudado mucho ya que aumentado los juegos y los clientes. Actualmente est solicitando financiamiento para invertir en el negocio en la compra de equipos y discos nuevos de juegos.
texts.en: Evelyn Scarlet is an entrepreneur whose business, which is located in her home, is offering video game services. She is a client of Fundacin Len, which has offered her financing for her business. She has expressed to us that this has helped her a lot since she has increased the number of games and customers. Currently, she is requesting financing in order to invest in the business by purchasing equipment and new game disks.

loan.use: to purchase equipment and new video game disks.

loan.name: Moyopata-San Sebastian Group

texts.es:
La mayora de los socios del banco comunal MOYOPATA-SAN SEBASTIAN se retiraron pero entraron otras personas. Actualmente, el banco comunal encuentra en el noveno ciclo de funcionamiento (cada ciclo est conformado por 4 meses). El banco comunal est conformado por 10 personas trabajadoras y emprendedoras que buscan a cada momento las oportunidades para salir adelante y con su esfuerzo diario entregar un mejor futuro a sus hijos. La mayora de los socios viven en la ciudad donde realizan sus actividades econmicas. Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turstica, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo Machupicchu.
La socia Vilma, tiene 35 aos, es padre y madre para sus dos hijos, ella trabaja en una de las municipalidades distritales de la ciudad del Cusco en el rea de seguridad ciudadana. Ya son varios aos que se dedica al trabajo y le ha va muy bien gracias al empeo que pone a sus funciones, ella requiere el prstamo para uso personal sea para la alimentacin y ropa de sus hijos.
Los socios valoran y agradecen el prstamo otorgado mediante este medio y as mismo se comprometen a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido. (En la parte inferior de la fotografa aparece la socia que llego tarde a la reunin).
texts.en:
The majority of the members of the communal bank "Moyopata -- San Sebastian" have withdrawn from the group, but other people have joined. Now the communal bank is in its ninth loan cycle (each cycle is four months long). The communal bank consists of 10 hard-working and entrepreneurial people who are looking at every moment for opportunities to advance and with their daily effort to give their children a better future. The majority of the members live in the city, where they carry out their business activities. Cusco is known for being a very touristic and business area, for its traditional festival, the Inti Raymi, and because one of the seven marvels of the world, Machu Picchu, is found there.
Bank member Vilma, who is 35 years old, is both father and mother to her two children. She works in one of the municipal districts of the city of Cusco in the area of city security. She has done this work for a number of years, and it is going very well for her, thanks to the effort that she puts into her duties. She needs a loan for personal use; she needs to buy food and clothing for her children.
The members appreciate and are grateful for the loan that is offered to them through this means, and they promise to make all their payments on the established schedule. (A member who arrived late for the meeting appears in the lower part of the photograph.)

loan.use: to buy food and clothing for her children.

loan.name: Nubia Carina

texts.es: Nubia Carina es soltera, habita junto a su familia compuesta por su mam, 2 hermanos y 3 sobrinitos, trabaja como cajera en almacenes El Verdugo desde hace 1 aos. Esta solicitando su 4to credito con el objetivo de comprar alambres y otros accesorios que serviran para instalar el sistema electrico de su casa, pues hace unos dias hizo cortocircuito y le recomendaron cambiarlo porque el que tiene no sirve. Cabe mencionar que Nubia anteriormente fue beneficiada con kiva, pero para invertir en su pequeo negocio de venta de ropa usada que tiene con su hermana.
texts.en: Nubia Carina is single, and lives with her family, which includes her mother, 2 brothers and 3 young nephews. She has worked as a cashier in the El Verdugo store for a year. She is requesting her 4th loan, with the goal of buying wires and other accessories that will be used to install an electrical system in her home. A few days ago her electrical system short-circuited, and she's been told that it is not good and she needs to replace it. It is worth mentioning that Nubia previously took a Kiva loan, but that one was invested in the small business that she has with her sister selling used clothing.

loan.use: to repair the electrical system in her house

loan.name: Ana Lilian

texts.es:
Ana tiene 28 aos de edad, vive con su compaero de vida.
Ella tiene 8 aos de administrar su propio negocio de sala de belleza. Ella comenta que aprendi este oficio debido a que no pudo seguir estudiando y decidi sacar un curso de cosmetologa y con el apoyo de su compaero de vida instalo su sala de belleza. Antes Ana solo se dedicaba a realizar los oficios domsticos en su casa.
Para comprar los materiales que necesita en su negocio, se traslada a una ciudad del oriente del pas en autobs durante una hora, ya que hay unos 35 kilmetros de su casa a la ciudad, ella va a comprar ah por que le dan mejores precios. Ana sale muy temprano a realizar las compras para regresar a atender su negocio ya que tiene muchos clientes.
Ana solicita el prstamo a Fundacin Campo, para comprar tintes, descolorantes, alicates, agujas de crocho, guantes, cremas spray, tijeras, entre otros ms y la otra parte para cancelar otro crdito a la Fundacin. Con la inversin dispondr de mayor cantidad de productos para atender a sus clientes y brindarles un mejor servicio obteniendo mayores ingresos para ella y su familia, ya que ayudara a su esposo con los gastos del hogar.
Ana planea contar con un mejor establecimiento y ms surtido, contratar a una persona para que le ayude a prestar un mejor servicio, pues por el momento solo ella trabaja en el local.
texts.en:
Ana is 28 years old. She lives with her common-law husband.
She has had 8 years of experience in running her own business, a beauty salon. She comments that she learned this trade because she could not continue going to school and decided to take a course in cosmetology. With the help of her husband, she set up her beauty shop. Before, Ana only carried out household duties in her home.
To buy the materials that she needs in her business, she travels by bus to a city in the eastern part of the country. The trip takes an hour, since it is about 35 kilometers from her house to the city. She goes there to make her purchases because they give her better prices there. Ana leaves very early to make her purchases so that she can come back and tend to her business, since she has many customers.
Ana is applying to Fudacin Campo for a loan to buy dyes, bleaches, pliers, crochet hooks, gloves, spray creams, and scissors, among other items, and also to pay back another loan from the foundation. With the investment, she will have a greater quantity of products at her disposal, so that she tend to her customers and offer them better service, obtaining a greater income for her and her family, since she will help her husband with the household expenses.
Ana plans to have a better and more well-stocked shop and to hire a person to help her give better service, since at this time she works alone in the shop.

loan.use: to buy dyes, bleaches, pliers, crochet hooks, gloves, spray creams, and scissors, among other items, and to pay back another loan from the foundation

loan.name: Maria Del Rosario

texts.es: La seora Maria Del Rosario esta solicitando un crdito para comprar lo necesario para el equipo adecuado para la venta de tacos de barbacoa , ya que quiere agregar esta comida a su men de alimentos a su pequeo negocio de venta de comido. Los que atiende el negocio son Doa Maria Del Rosario y su esposo quien son los que preparan la comida y atiende a sus clientes. Este negocio es la fuente de ingreso que tiene para su familia y darles lo necesario a sus hijos. Desea invertir en el negocio y as tener mayores ganancias.
texts.en:
Maria Del Rosario is requesting a loan to buy the proper equipment to sell barbequed meat tacos, because she wants to add this dish to her food menu in her small food business.
Maria Del Rosario and her husband are the ones who run this business, preparing the food and tending to their customers.
This business is the source of income for their family, and it allows them to provide for the needs of their children. Maria wants to invest in the business so that she can have greater earnings.

loan.use: to outfit her kitchen so that she can make and sell barbequed meat tacos

loan.name: Reynaldo

texts.es: Reynaldo tiene 39 aos, es un hombre alegre y trabajador, vive en su casa propia junto a su pareja Bertha de 43 aos y sus 05 queridos hijos, a quienes desea brindarle una mejor calidad de vida. Los campos de sembrado que con tanto esfuerzo a conseguido Reynaldo, son el principal sustento que tiene su familia, sus productos son muy solicitados en los centros de acopio donde los lleva a vender, ya que su notoriedad de cosechar cacao son de buena calidad y por lo cual sus productos son vendidos a muy buenos precios. Lo que ms le gusta de su trabajo es cuidar sus sembros de las plagas que pueden aquejarlos, ya que esto puede afectar sus ingresos. Lleva 17 aos realizando esta actividad y considera que lo ms difcil es transportar los sacos de sus cultivos, ya que son muy pesados y le quitan mucha energa. Con el crdito solicitado comprar sacos de abono para mejorar sus tierras y as posteriormente cosechar frutos en abundancia. Este es crdito numero 12 con MFP, sabe que el dinero del crdito le ser muy beneficioso para el desarrollo de su trabajo por el cual esta llano a pagar sus cuotas puntualmente. En su banco comunal es un socio muy alegre y siempre pone orden en las reuniones. Con los 1,500 nuevos soles; comprara sacos de abono para fertilizar sus tierras.
texts.en:
Reynaldo, 39, is a happy and hardworking man. He lives in his own home with his partner Bertha, 43, and their 5 beloved children, to whom they want to provide a better quality of life. The farmland which Reynaldo has acquired with a lot of effort is the main source of sustenance for his family. His products are very much sought after in the collection centers where he takes them to sell because of his reputation for harvesting good quality cocoa, and because he sells his products at very good prices. What he likes most about his work is caring for his crops and preventing them from being attacked by pests, because this can affect his income. He has been farming for 17 years, and what he considers most difficult is transporting his sacks of harvested crops, because they are very heavy and this takes a lot of energy.
With the loan that he requests, he will buy sacks of organic fertilizer to improve his lands, so that he can later have an abundant harvest. This is his 12th loan with MFP. He knows that the money from this loan will be very helpful to him in developing his work, and so he is prepared to make his payments on time. In his communal bank, he is a member who is very cheerful and who always brings order to the meetings. With the 1,500 Peruvian soles he requests, he will buy sacks of manure to fertilize his fields.

loan.use: to buy sacks of organic fertilizer

loan.name: Luis Manuel

texts.es: Luis Manuel de 58 aos de edad es casado, labora para el MINED desde hace 25 ao como docente en una escuela de Tecolostote. Esta solicitando su 10mo credito con el objetivo de continuar mejorando su casa, reparando el piso de su cuarto que esta daado. El profesor Luis se caracteriza por ser muy responsable con sus compromisos. Es importante mencionar que los ultimos creditos que ha solicitado han sido para mejorar la casa en que vive, anteriormente logro mejorar las divisiones de los cuartos que se estaban deteriorando. Expresa sentirse muy agradecido por el apoyo brindado por la institucion y por kiva, que esta apoyando a las personas pobres a mejorar su nivel de vida y el de su familia.
texts.en: Luis Manuel, 58, is married and has worked for MINED (the Ministry of Education) for 25 years as a teacher in a school in Tecolostote. He is requesting his 10th loan, which he plans to use to continue to make improvements to his house, repairing a floor that is damaged in his room. The teacher Luis is known to be very responsible with his commitments. It is important to mention that the last loans that he has requested have also been used for improving the house that he lives in. Previously, he managed to improve the walls between the rooms, which were deteriorating. He expresses that he feels very grateful for the support provided by the institution and Kiva that is helping poor people and their families to improve their standard of living.

loan.use: to repair a floor in his house

loan.name: Martha Ligia

texts.es: Martha de 34 aos es soltera, trabaja para el MINED en la Escuela Enrique Tierno Galvan desde hace 15 aos como maestra de primaria. Esta solicitando refinanciamiento de su 9no credito con el objetivo de construir un anexo en casa de sus padres y asi contar con mayor privacidad y comodidad, pues necesita asegurar un poco sus cosas, ya que ha sido victima de robo de algunos vecinos. Cabe sealar que Martha se caracteriza por ser muy responsable con sus compromisos.
texts.en: Martha is 34 years old, single and has been working for MINED at the Enrique Tierno Galvan School for the past fifteen years as a primary school teacher. She is asking for another loan, her ninth loan, in order to build an addition to her parents house. They would like more privacy and comfort. They also need to secure their things more effectively, as some of their neighbors have been robbed. It needs to be noted that Martha is very responsible with her commitments

loan.use: to build a room.

loan.name: Andre

texts.en: Andre is 49 years old. He is a father of seven children, aged between 11 and 21. All of his children go to school. He has requested the loan to buy more beans, maize, tomatoes and sorghum because he has shifted from the previous business from where he has joined the business of selling foodstuffs. With the profits he will renovate the house. In the future, Andre would like to own a stock of foodstuffs.

loan.use: To buy more beans, tomatoes and sorghum to sell

loan.name: Kua Aty Group

texts.es: El comit Kua Aty se form con la unin de varias vecinas de la comunidad de Union. Todas las integrantes del comit desarrollan actividades independientes, pero tambin actividades en conjunto, con lo cual podrn seguir creciendo como grupo. Luciana es una de las miembros del grupo, ella es una mujer muy trabajadora y sacrificada, ya que ella se dedica a la lavar ropa ajena para poder mantener a su familia. Dice que es un trabajo muy duro, pues hay veces que termina el da muy cansada, pero ella no se cansa de trabajar, pues es la nica forma de salir adelante. Ella solicita el crdito para la compra de jabones en polvo, detergentes, suavizantes para ropas y dems artculos necesarios para poder seguir con su negocio. Agradece a la fundacin y a Kiva por la oportunidad que estas le dan de poder seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
The committee Kuna Aty, was formed when various members of the Union community came together. All of the members of the committee engage in independent as well as group activities, which allows them to continue growing as a group.
Luciana is one of the members of the group. She works hard and sacrifices a lot. She works as a clothes washer to be able to support her family. She says that it is very tiring work, and there are times that she is exhausted at the end of the day. She does not tire of working, however, because it is how she advances in life.
She is requesting the loan to purchase powdered soaps, detergents, clothing softeners, and other items necessary to run her business. She is thankful for the foundation and for Kiva, because they provide her opportunities for growth.

loan.use: purchase powdered soaps, detergents, and clothing softeners.

loan.name: Ruben

texts.es: Rubn de 32 aos de edad, es un hombre soltero, vive en casa propia y se esmera en seguir adelante. Desde muy nio sus padres le inculcaron a trabajar en la chacra, hoy es campesino y viene trabajando 15 aos en sus propias tierras. En su parcela cuenta con variedad de plantaciones como: plantas de cacao. En tiempos de cosecha necesita el apoyo de la mano de los peones que contrata, para as avanzar con las extracciones de los frutos y hojas de coca. Lo que ms le gusta de su trabajo es cosechar, de esa manera ve la recompensa en la calidad de sus frutos. Considera que lo ms difcil es transportar sus frutos desde la chacra hasta los centros de acopio que estn situadas en su localidad, lugar donde le ofrecen mejores precios por sus productos. En adelante, desea comprar nuevas tierras para incrementar sus cultivos y sembrar plantas de cacao. Este ser su crdito nmero 02 con MFP, siente que el dinero del crdito le ayudar mucho en el progreso de su trabajo. Agradece a la institucin Prisma por concederle el prstamo. Con los 2,000 nuevos soles, contratar peones para realizar el desmonte de malezas y comprar semillas de caf para sembrar en su parcela.
texts.en: Ruben is 32 years old, single and lives in his own house. He wants to succeed. Since he was a young child, his parents have taught him to work on the farm. Now he is a farmworker and he has been working on his own land for the past fifteen years. On his land he grows a variety of crops, such as cacao. During the harvest her needs the support of contract workers in order to pick the fruit and the coca leaves. What he likes the most about his work is the harvest. This is how he is rewarded for the good quality of his fruit. The most difficult part of his work is transporting his fruit from the farm to the gathering centers, which are located in his area. This is the place that offers the best price for his products. In the future he would like to buy more land in order to increase his plantings and also grow coffee plants. This is his second loan with MFP. He feels that this money helps him greatly with his work. He is grateful to the Prisma Institution for offering him this loan. With the 2,000 new soles, he will hire workers to help him with cutting down the weeds and he will buy seeds to plant on his land.

loan.use: to hire workers and buy coffee seeds.

loan.name: Fayzullo

texts.en: Fayzullo is a 44 year-old man, who is married and has three children. He lives in a remote, hard-to-reach district, where the residents primarily take their livestock to pasture. Fattening up and selling livestock is the main activity of the residents here. Besides this, Fayzullo works as a construction worker at private sites. His salary during the winter period is not enough to meet the living minimum, but the profit from the animal husbandry business provides for his family. Today, he has one cow and ten sheep. Fayzullo wants to use this loan to purchase several more goats and sheep.

loan.use: to purchase goats and sheep

loan.name: Rosa Edilma

texts.es: Dedicacin a su trabajo y amorosa con sus 3 hijos, son las dos cualidades con las que mejor se reconoce a Rosa Edilma, quien desde hace 3 aos se vio en la obligacin de generar los ingresos para su hogar debido a que se separ de su esposo y se convirti en una madre soltera cabeza de familia. Rosa Edilma desde entonces se ha venido esforzando cada vez ms con el objetivo de construir un negocio rentable y perdurable con el cual pueda seguir generando los ingresos para su hogar. Es por esto que hoy da se dedica a la comercializacin de productos de uso personal,tales como shampoo, cremas de manos, lociones, entre otros productos de uso personal.Sus ventas las realiza generalmente a sus amigos y personas de su sector, y muy espordicamente se consigue un cliente nuevo interesado en sus productos. Con el nimo de incrementar sus ventas, Rosa Edilma pretende aumentar sus ventas significativamente, y sabe que para poder hacerlo debe aumentar la variedad de productos que ofrece a sus clientes, por lo que requiere de la compra de mercanca de uso personal para hacer ms atractivo su negocio. Sin embargo, Rosa Edilma no cuenta con el capital necesario para comprar la mercanca, y es por esto que Rosa Edilma busca un prstamo el cual le permita comprar mercanca y surtir su negocio de productos de uso personal como shampoo, cremas de manos, lociones, entre otros productos, de modo que sus clientes queden mas interesados en sus productos y as aumente sus ventas. Rosa Edilma suea con que sus 3 hijos puedan crecer en un buen ambiente de familia, alejados de toda clase de problemas, y que ella les pueda brindar una estabilidad econmica y la mejor educacin posible.
texts.en:
Dedication to her work and love for her 3 children are the two qualities for which Rosa Edilma is best known. For 3 years now she has been the breadwinner for the family since she separated from her husband and became a single mother. Since then, Rosa Edilma has worked harder and harder to build a profitable and lasting business that will keep generating income for her household. For this reason she is now selling personal hygiene products. She mostly sells to her friends and people in her neighborhood, and occasionally she gets a new customer who is interested in her products.
Rosa Edilma is looking for a loan that will allow her to buy merchandise and stock her business so that her customers are more interested in her products and her sales will increase.
Rosa Edilma dreams that her 3 children will grow up in a good family environment, protected from all kinds of problems, and that she will be able to give them financial stability and the best education possible.

loan.use: to purchase personal use products like shampoo, hand cream, lotions and others

loan.name: Israel

texts.en: Israel is 42 years old. He is married to a farmer with nine children. All of them go to school. He sells different items such as soap, salt and cooking oil, a business which he has been running for the past 10 years.
