He has requested the loan to buy more similar items to add to the same business inventory. With the profits, he will pay school fees for the children.

loan.use: To buy more soap, salt and cooking oil.

loan.name: Marcia Pastora

texts.es: Marcia Pastora de 46 aos de edad es soltera, labora para el MINED desde hace 25 aos en la Escuela San Nicolas. Esta solicitando su 9no credito con el objetivo de construir un sumidero, ya que su letrina ya esta deteriorada y como su patio es un poco incomodo porque una parte queda en alto desea construir el sumidero para hacer un solo gasto, ademas esto le permitira tener mejores condiciones en su pequea casa. Cabe mencionar que la profesora Marcia se caracteriza por su responsabilidad y deseos de mejorar sus condiciones de vida, pues el credito anterior lo utilizo para ponerle verjas a la parte de enfrente de su casa que le sirve como porche y construyo las gradas de la entrada a la casa, por lo que se siente muy agradecida con kiva por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Marcia Pastora is 46 years old and is single. She has worked for MINED for the past 25 years, at the Saint Nicolas School. She is asking for this loan, her ninth one, in order to install a sink, as her bathroom is deteriorating. Her patio is a bit uncomfortable as part of it is higher than the other part. She would like to install a sink as this would be one expense and it would improve the conditions in her small house. Marcia, a teacher, is a responsible person. She would like to improve her living conditions. The last loan she used to build a gate in front of her house. She now has a porch that is graded up to her house. She is thankful to KIVA for the support they have provided

loan.use: to install a sink.

loan.name: Mukkaram

texts.en: Mukkaram is a 60 year-old woman, who lives and runs her business in the city of Khujand. She sells dairy products, such as cottage cheese, butter, heavy cream and sour cream. She also makes clarified butter from sour cream and sells it wholesale to confectionery factories. During that time, her daughter fills in for her at her retail outlet Mukkaram does not have a husband, as he passed away in 2000, and this is why she is an independent woman, who supports her family. Mukkaram wants to use this loan to increase the production of baked milk by buying raw materials.

loan.use: to purchase raw materials for production of baked milk

loan.name: Silvia

texts.es: La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de costurera,la socia se dedica al negocio de costura,la socia cose pantalones,blusas,faldas entre otras ropas y tambien la socia teje chompas para nios,mujeres y varones,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos,el sueo de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender la ropa.La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar lana al por mayor y tambien para comprar tela,hilos y palitos de tejer. La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: This member is a seamstress. She has a sewing business. She sews pants, blouses, skirts as well as other clothes. She also knits mens, womens and childrens sweaters. Because of this business, she can help her children succeed. Her dream is to have a place where she can sell clothes. She is asking for this loan in order to buy wool wholesale and also to buy fabric, thread and knitting needles. This member is happy to have this loan and promises to pay her payments on time.

loan.use: to buy wholesale wool and also to buy fabric, thread and knitting needles.

loan.name: Shohida

texts.en: Shohida has been a client of our organization since 2008. Fattening up and selling livestock is her business. She uses each of her obtained loans to buy livestock, then sells it at a good profit, after fattening it up. She then spends the profit for family expenses. Shohida's son helps her with the business because her husband is working in Russia. Besides this business, Shohida is also involved in selling milk and kefir. Their livestock goes to a pasture, and a shepherd returns it home in the evening. Shohida plans to use this loan to purchase two, big dairy cows.

loan.use: to purchase two cows

loan.name: Roxana

texts.es: La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de cuyes y tambien se sigue dedicando a transporte,ella alquila un taxi y lo hace trabajar como servicio de taxi y los cuyes lo vende en las diferentes ferias que existe en el distrito de Anta,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos,el sueo de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los cuyes y tambien poder mejorar el servicio de taxi.La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar cuyes y tambien para comprar llantas para su carro. La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Roxana continues selling guinea pigs and also continues working in transportation. She rents out a car that is put to use as a taxi. She sells the guinea pigs in the different markets that take place in the Anta district. Through this business she can help her sons get ahead in life. Her dream is to have a place where she can sell her guinea pigs and also be able to improve her taxi service. She is requesting the loan to purchase guinea pigs and tires for the car. She is happy to have the loan and she commits to making her loan payments.

loan.use: purchase guinea pigs and tires for her car

loan.name: Beatriz Elena

texts.es: A sus 55 aos Beatriz Elena se ha visto obligada en cubrir las obligaciones de su hogar desde que su esposo sufri un accidente. Adems de esto tiene 2 hijos a los cuales les debe brindar todo lo necesario, y por los que trabaja ms fuerte cada da. Es por esto que Beatriz Elena, como ya conoca la actividad de la confeccin, decidi iniciar con su propio negocio y trabajar confeccionando por contrato a terceros y poco a poco sacar su lnea propia. Gracias a esta actividad, y a esta decisin de emprendimiento, Beatriz Elena ha podido sufragar los gastos del hogar, y sus hijos no han tenido que ver afectada su calidad de vida fuertemente. Ahora, Beatriz Elena aspira a que su negocio pueda expandirse, tener ms contratos de confeccin a terceros y as con las utilidades ir expandiendo tambin la confeccin de su lnea propia. Es por esto que Beatriz Elena esta en busca de un prstamo que le permita realizar mejoras locativas a su negocio, donde su sitio de trabajo quede mas grande, y tambin comprar materia prima para la confeccin de unos contratos que hizo con uno de sus clientes. Beatriz Elena aspira que con la expansin de su negocio mejoren sus ingresos y pueda de esta manera cumplir su sueo de tener una lnea propia confeccionada por ella y que este posicionada en el mercado. De esta manera, sus hijos tendrn una mejor calidad de vida con una estabilidad econmica que les permita acceder a la mejor educacin posible.
texts.en:
At 55 years of age, Beatriz Elena has been obligated to cover the household duties since her husband suffered an accident. Besides this she has two children to whom she gives everything necessary, and because of this she works harder each day. And this is why Beatriz Elena, as she already knew the clothing industry, decided to open her own business, manufacturing through contract to third parties and little by little to make her own line.
Thanks to this activity, and the decision of entrepreneurship, Beatriz Elena has been able to meet the household expenses and her children have not had to see their quality of life affected very much.
Now Beatriz Elena hopes that she can expand her business, to have more dressmaking contracts with third parties, and with the profits go on expanding the manufacturing of her own line of clothing. This is why Beatriz Elena is looking for a loan that will permit her to improve her facility, making her worksite larger, and also to buy raw materials in order to complete some of the contracts that she has made with one of her clients.
Beatriz Elena hopes that with the expansion of her business, her profits increase and in this way fulfill her dream of having her own line of ready-to-wear clothing positioned in the market. In this way, her children will have a better quality of life with economic stability that permits them to afford the best education possible.

loan.use: to improve the facility, expanding her worksite, and to buy raw materials in order to carry through with a contract that she has with a client

loan.name: Hector

texts.es: El socio se sigue dedicando al negocio de transporte,el tiene un carro que hace servicio de transporte,el socio trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio el socio quiere salir adelante a sus hijos,el sueo del socio es tener un carro nuevo.El socio solicita el prstamo para comprar repuestos y llantas para su carro. El socio est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member continues working in the transport business. He has a car that he uses in the transport service. The member works from 8:00AM until 7:00PM. Through this business he is supporting his children.
The dream of the member is to have a new car.
The member is asking for a loan in order to buy spare parts and tires for his car.
The member is happy for the loan and he promises to make his payments according to schedule.

loan.use: to buy spare parts and tires for his car

loan.name: Anonymous Group
loan.use: to increase his working capital and to stock up on merchandise (drinks, shoes, meats) to sell in order to make a profit.

loan.name: San Agustn Group

texts.es: El comit San Agustn se form con la unin de varias vecinas de la ciudad de Mariano Roque Alonso. Todas las integrantes del comit desarrollan actividades independientes, pero tambin realizan conjuntamente actividades que fortalecen su compaerismo. Ellas se unieron con la intecion de trabajar juntas y por medio de ese trabajo en equipo poder ayudar a sus familias. La Seora Julia es una de las integrantes del comit, ella se dedica a las ventas de zapatillas bordadas, tambin hace agogos de tela, hebillitas. Es una seora muy creativa y con ganas de salir adelante. Ella no tiene hijos y su marido es Empleado. Se encuentra muy satisfecha con su actividad y las capacitaciones que recibe el grupo. Gracias a su trabajo ella puede ayudar a su marido y de esa forma poder aligerar un poco los gastos de la casa. La seora Julia solicita el crdito para la compra de Materiales, como ser zapatillas, mostacillas, perlitas, argollas y dems insumos necesarios para hacer sus zapatillas bordadas. Agradece a la fundacin y a Kiva por la oportunidad que estas le dan.
texts.en:
The communal bank San Agustn was formed by various neighbors getting together in the city of Mariano Roque Alonso. All of the members the communal bank are working independently, but also they have group activities in order to strengthen their relationship. They came together with the intention of working together and through their team work be able to help their families.
Julia is one of the members of the communal bank. She works selling embroidered slippers, and she also makes cloth bells and buckles.
She is a very creative lady and she hopes to get ahead.
She has no children and her husband is employed. She is very happy in her work and the training the group receives. Thanks to her work she can help her husband and in this way be able to ease a little of the household expenses.
Julia is asking for a loan in order to buy supplies, such as slippers, beads including beaded pearls, rings and the rest of the necessary supplies in order to make her embroidered slippers.
She is grateful to the foundation and to Kiva for the opportunity that they give her.

loan.use: to buy slippers, beads including beaded pearls, rings and the rest of the necessary supplies in order to make her embroidered slippers

loan.name: Santos

texts.es: Santos de 34 aos, tiene 10 aos de casado con dos hijos de 9 y 2 aos de edad, uno de ellos estudia en la escuela, vive en aldea San Juan de la Lima, Cortes. Santos tiene cuatro aos de haber establecido una pulpera donde vende productos de abarrotera, granos bsicos como frijoles, arroz, lcteos, carnes, aceite, medicinas, refrescos etc. este negocio lo inicio vendiendo carnes y condimentos, pero los clientes demandaban de otros productos y con fondos propios lo surti. Para atender a sus clientes le ayuda su esposa todos los das. Este prstamo es el primero que solicita y es para surtir ms el negocio en productos de abarrotera, granos bsicos, lcteos, refrescos y otros. Su meta es mantener surtido para incrementar las ventas, con las ganancias va ampliar su vivienda para ubicar mejor el negocio y llegar a tener una bodega pequea de productos de abarrotera.
texts.en:
Santos, age 34, has been married for ten years. He has two children, ages nine and two. One of them goes to school. He lives in the village of San Juan de la Lima, Cortes.
Four years ago Santos established a store where he sells grocery products like basic grains such as beans, rice, dairy products, meat, oil, medicine, and soft drinks, etc. He started this business selling meat and condiments. However, his customers requested other products, and he stocked them with his own funds. His wife helps him take care of his customers every day.
This is the first loan that he has requested. It is to better stock the business with grocery products, basic grains, dairy products, soft drinks, and others. His goal is to keep his business stocked in order to increase sales. He will use the income to expand his house to better place his business and to come to have a small grocery store.

loan.use: to stock the business with grocery products, basic grains, dairy products, and soft drinks.

loan.name: San Pablo Apostol Group

texts.es: Las mujeres del presente comit son de la cuidad de Caacup. Son 13 mujeres que trabajan de forma conjunta y han podido salir adelante y ayudarse las unas a las otras. Actualmente estn en el segundo ciclo y desean poder llegar al mximo nivel del programa. Una de las integrantes es la seora Yessica, quien vende todo tipo de prendas de variadas marcas. Comenta que se dedica a esto hace un tiempo y que le va muy bien, pues ya tiene una clientela formada. Comenta que empez con algo pequeo, pero con el correr del tiempo y gracias a su habilidad para las ventas actualmente ha logrado progresar mucho. Ella solicita el crdito para poder surtir su variedad de prendas con camisillas, shorts, remeras, vestidos y dems tipo de ropas, pues estas son las que ms salida tienen en esta temporada del ao.
texts.en:
The women of this committee live in the city of Caacup. There are 13 women who work together and have been able to get ahead and help each other. At present, they are in their second cycle and they want to get to the program's highest level.
One of the members is Yessica. She sells all types of clothing of different brands. She remarks that she has done this for some time and it is going well for her, as she has regular customers. She says she started with something small, but over time and thanks to her ability for sales, she has been able to progress a lot.
She is asking for this loan to be able to stock up with a variety of clothing such as tank tops, shorts, t-shirts, dresses and more. These are the clothes that sell the most at this time of year.

loan.use: to buy tank tops, shorts, t-shirts, dresses and other types of clothing.

loan.name: Maria Judith

texts.es: La seora Mara se dedica a la venta de ropa, es soltera no tiene hijos, la seora vive con sus papas y hermanos, ella vive en casa familiar que se encuentra ubicado en la localidad de Colomi, tiene un puesto de venta en dicha localidad, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa hace ya varios aos, realiza su venta los das jueves y domingo, ya que esos das son feria Colomi. El prstamo es para la compra de material de construccin y mantenimiento de la vivienda, ya que quiere ampliar con la construccin de un cuarto y as poder brindar mayor comodidad a su familia, la Sra. Mara es una persona muy amable y gentil siempre pensando en la bienestar de sus hermanos y de su mama, se siente agradecido con la institucin por el apoyo que le brindan ya que de esta manera mejora la calidad de vida de toda su familia.
texts.en:
Mara's business is selling clothes. She is single and doesn't have any children. She lives with her parents and siblings in their family home which is located in the town of Colomi. She has a stall in the town where she has been selling clothes for several years. She makes her sales on Thursdays and Sundays as these are market days in Colomi.
This loan will be used to buy building supplies and to carry out work on the house. She would like to extend the house by building a room so that she can provide her family with greater comfort. Mara is a very kind and gentle-natured person who is always thinking of her siblings' and her mom's well-being. She feels grateful to the institution for the support that they give her as it helps her to improve her whole family's quality of life.

loan.use: to add a room to her home

loan.name: Anonymous Group
loan.use: to buy beer, wine, soda, etc.

loan.name: San Blas Group

texts.es: El comit San Blas se encuentra en el octavo ciclo del programa de Mujeres Emprendedoras de la Fundacin Paraguaya, tiene 18 integrantes. Todas ellas anhelan un futuro mejor para sus hijos, distinto del que a ellas toc vivir, por eso se esfuerzan para poder proveerles a sus familias el pan de cada da, la educacin y formacin. Una de las miembros es Blanca, quien vende Leche por todo su vecindario. Ella comenta que ya tiene una clientela fiel formada, que siempre compran de ella el producto que vende. Empieza su jornada de trabajo desde muy temprano, pues la leche debe estar en las mesas de sus clientes para el desayuno. Es un trabajo muy sacrificado, dice, pero le gusta, pues es digno y honesto. Ella solicita el crdito para la compra de leche, y de esa forma tener un buen stock para cumplir con sus clientes. Agradece a la fundacin y a Kiva por la oportunidad que estas le dan.
texts.en:
The San Blas committee is now in its eighth cycle of the Enterprising Women of the Paraguay Foundation program and is made up of 18 members. All of them dream of a better future for their children than what they have lived through, which is why they make the effort to provide their family with daily meals, education and a good upbringing.
Blanca is one of the group members. She sells milk all throughout her neighbourhood and tells us that she has steady and loyal customers who always buy their milk from her. Blanca starts her working day very early as the milk has to be on her customers' tables by breakfast time. She tells us that her job requires a great sacrifice, but she likes it because it is decent and honest work.
Blanca is applying for a loan to buy enough milk to meet customer demand. She is thankful to the foundation and to Kiva for the opportunity they have given her.

loan.use: to purchase milk for resale

loan.name: Reynaldo

texts.es: El seor Reynaldo esta solicitando un crdito para surtir su negocio, ya que le esta haciendo falta mas variedad de mercanca de abarrotes que es productos de lata, lactis y verduras; ya que con las vacaciones navideas se le termino casi toda su mercanca. Este negocio es familia ya que entre Don Reynaldo y su esposa se encargan de atender el negocio y en vacaciones sus hijos le ayudan acomodar los artculos y a la limpiar el local, ya que es la fuente de ingresos que tiene para brindarles un mejor patrimonio a su familia.
texts.en: Mr Reynaldo is requesting a loan to stock his business, since he needs more variety of grocery merchandise such as canned goods, dairy products and vegetables; because of the Christmas holidays, he has almost run out of merchandise. This is a family business. Reynaldo and his wife attend to the business. During the holidays, their children help them to put out displays and clean the store. This store is his source of income with which to provide his family with their needs.

loan.use: to buy merchandise to stock his business.

loan.name: Yesica

texts.es: La seora Yesica es nacida en la ciudad de Santa Cruz de la Sierra vive actualmente con su conyugue y su hijo en la zona San Pedro. Su negocio es en el mismo domicilio. Ella se dedica a la confeccin de prendas de vestir (mandiles, polleras y otros) hace mas de 9 aos esta en su segunda secuencia con la institucin, La seora Yesica demostr ser responsable en su crdito anterior ya que cancelo sus cuotas sin ningn retraso, ahora el crdito otorgado a la seora es para la compra de insumos (tela, hilo, cierres y otros) para as confeccionar mas prendas de vestir y poder tener mas variedad para ofrecer a sus clientes y tambin ya que tiene muchos pedidos que entregar, la Sra. Yesica ase siente agradecida por la oportunidad que le brindan ya que le permiten crecer en su negocio.
texts.en: Seora Yesica was born in the city of Santa Cruz de la Sierra, where she currently lives with her husband and child in the San Pedro zone. She runs her business out of her home. She has made clothing (aprons, skirts and other items) for over nine years. This is her second loan cycle with the institution, and she has proven herself to be responsible with her loans. She payed off her previous loan without even one late payment. The loan that she has now been authorized is for the purchase of supplies (fabric, thread, clasps and other items) so that she can make more items of clothing and thus have more variety to offer her customers. She has many orders to fill. Yesica is grateful for this opportunity because it will allow her and her business to grow.

loan.use: to buy thread, clasps and other items.

loan.name: Mujeres Unidas Group

texts.es: El contacto para el inicio del presente comit fue una de las miembros, quien inspirada en crear un bien para sus amigas, las invito y organizo para formar parte del programa Comit de Mujeres Emprendedoras. Limpia es una mujer muy trabajadora, que diariamente se esfuerza por un mejor sustento para su familia. Ella se sacrifica por ellos, ya que desea darles un mayor bien. Limpia se dedica a la venta de ropas y nos cuenta que hace ya un tiempo que se dedica a esto, y gracias al tiempo que lleva en esto ya pudo armarse una buena clientela. Su meta es poder seguir creceindo y temer un gran local de ventas. Ella acude a la fundacion y a kiva para pedir un crdito, el cual desea invertir en la compra de prendas de verano, pues estamos en epoca de calor y quiere abastecerse para poder dar mayor variedad a sus clientes.
texts.en: One of the members was the one who started this committee. She was inspired to create something good for her friends, so she invited them to join together and organized them into part of the Programa Comite de Mujeres Emprendedoras. Limpia is a very hard-working woman. She gives her all every day to better sustain her family. She sacrifices herself for them, because she wants to give them more. Limpia sells clothing and tells us that she has been doing so for some time now. Thanks to her experience in this business, she has been able to build up a good client base. Her goal is to be able to continue growing and to have a large store. She came to the Fundacion and to Kiva to request a loan which she would like to invest in the purchase of summer clothing. This is the hot season, and she wants to stock up in order to be able to offer her clients greater variety.

loan.use: to buy summer clothing for the next sale.

loan.name: Eduardo

texts.es: El sr. Eduardo vive en la zona de la Villa 1ro. De mayo. Es la casa de sus suegros, vive junto con su esposa y sus dos hijos pequeos, el sr. Eduardo se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales, chanchos, patos, gallinas, vacas y chivas las cuales vende por la zona y en la localidad de el Torno, esta es su segunda secuencia, no tubo ningn problema con el pago de sus cuotas, el crdito lo esta solicitando es para la compra de animales para engordarlos ya que por las fiestas de fin de ao hay mucha demanda de chancho y carne de vaca ya que tiene muchos clientes que le hicieron varios pedidos, El sr. Eduardo es una persona responsable, trabajadora ya que esta es su nica fuente de ingresos para que el mantenga a su familia, por este motivo le hecha muchas ganas y esfuerzo a su trabajo.
texts.en: Eduardo lives in Villa 1ro. de mayo at his in-laws house. He lives there with his wife and their two small children. Eduardo fattens and sells animals such as pigs, ducks, hens, cows and goats, which he sells around his community and in neighboring El Torno. This is Eduardo's second cycle. He did not have any problem repaying his first loan and is asking for this one in order to purchase animals to fatten, taking into account that the demand for pig and cow meat raises during the end of the year festivities. He has many clients that have already placed their orders. Eduardo is a responsible, hard working person because this is the only source of income to support his family. This is why he puts a lot of energy and effort to his work.

loan.use: to purchase animals for fattening

loan.name: Marvin Noe

texts.es: El seor Marvin tiene 28 aos de edad, esta casado y no tiene hijos, vive con sus padres y se dedica a prestar los servicios de reparacion de bicicletas, motocicletas y cambio de unas piezas de automovil, en su negocio vende llantas de carro usadas, aceites para carro y moto, todo tipo de repuestos para bicicletas etc. su negocio funciona en su casa de habitacion, tiene muchos clientes ya que sus precios son bajos y los productos que vende son buenos. el credito lo utilizara para la compra de llantas, aceite, repuestos para bicicletas y repuestos para motocicletas, desea tener mas repuestos en inventario para atender mejor a sus clientes. las ganancias las necesita para salir adelante.
texts.en:
Marvin is 28 years old, married, and doesnt have children. He lives with his parents, and dedicates himself to providing repair services for bicycles, motorcycles, and some automobile parts. In his business, he sells used car tires, oil for cars and motorcycles, and all types of bicycle replacements parts. He runs his business from his home, and has many customers due to the fact that his prices are low and because he sells quality products.
He will use the loan to buy tires, oil, as well as bicycle and motorcycle replacement parts. He wishes to have more parts in inventory to better service his customers.
He needs the earnings to get ahead.

loan.use: buy tires, oil, and replacement parts for bicycles and motorcycles.

loan.name: Irma

texts.es: Irma forma parte del Banco comunal El Almendral perteneciente a la comuna de Pealoln, ciudad de Santiago. Ella se dedica al rubro del comercio desde hace 40 aos, vende alimentos y verduras en un almacn que tiene ubicado al interior de su casa. Se desempea en estas funciones todos los das con un horario de 8 de la maana hasta las 10 de la noche. Su mercadera la compra usualmente en la feria de Lo Valledor (Central de abastecimiento) Comenta que tiene bastante clientela. Con el crdito comprar mercadera para surtir su negocio. Una de las metas para su negocio es abastecerlo con mercadera innovadora. Para brindarle a sus clientes mejores y nuevas opciones de compra. Irma vive junto a su marido y su hijo de 37 aos de edad, quien trabaja de manera dependiente. Uno de sus sueos a nivel personal es brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida. Ella est muy contenta y agradecida de la oportunidad que le ha brindado Fondo esperanza, ya que le ha permitido invertir en su negocio para generar mayores ganancias. Adems disfruta de la compaa de las dems emprendedoras, puesto que comparten actividades y otras experiencias, situacin que la distrae de sus tareas rutinarias. Respecto a las capacitaciones impartidas en las reuniones del Banco comunal, ha aprendido administrar de mejor manera su negocio, a pesar de su vasta experiencia en el rubro. Pealoln se localiza al oriente de la regin metropolitana. Cuenta con diversos atractivos tales como vias, edificios considerados patrimonio histrico y sitios naturales de excursin, elementos que estn transformando a esta comuna en un nuevo panorama turstico dentro de la regin Metropolitana.
texts.en:
Irma is part of the El Almendral (Almond Tree Grove) communal bank belonging to Pealoln Commune in the city of Santiago. She has been a merchant for 40 years selling food and vegetables in a store she has located inside her house. She works every day from 8am until 10pm. She usually buys her merchandise at the Lo Valledor street market (supply center). She comments that she has a large clientele. She will use the loan to buy merchandise to stock her store. One of her goals is to stock it with innovative merchandise to provide customers with better and new purchase options.
Irma lives with her husband and 37-year-old son who works independently. One of her dreams on a personal level is to provide her family with a better quality of life. She is very happy and grateful for the opportunity Fondo Esperanza has provided in that its made it possible for her to invest in her business to earn higher profits.
She enjoys the company of the other entrepreneurs because they share activities and other experiences, a situation that distracts her form her routine tasks. With respect to the training imparted at communal bank meetings, shes learned how to better run her business despite her vast experience in this line of work.
Pealoln is located in the east of the metropolitan region. It has several attractions like vineyards, historical buildings and places to go on nature hikes, elements that are transforming this commune into a new tourist destination within the metropolitan region.

loan.use: to buy merchandise to stock her store.

loan.name: Lilia Sarahi

texts.es: La seora Lilia tiene 25 aos de edad, esta casada y tiene un hijo, su esposo se dedica a la pesca y ella se dedica a la venta de productos de consumo diario, tiene una pulperia en su casa de habitacion, ahi vende todo lo relacionado con la canasta basica familiar. el credito lo utilizara para la compra de abarroteria, lacteos, carnes, granos basicos y pan., desea surtir su negocio, sus ventas estan aumentando y no tiene el capital suficiente para surtir la pulperia, esta epoca se vende bastante ya que en la zona comienza el trabajo de la salineras y sus clientes le consumen por mayor. Su objetivo es tener su propia casa.
texts.en:
Lilia, 25, is married and has a son. Her husband is a fisherman and she sells basic staple goods. She has a hone-based general store where she sells everything related to basic family staple needs.
She will use the loan to buy groceries, dairy products, meats, basic grains and bread. She wants to stock her store. Her sales are increasing and she does not have sufficient capital to stock it. Sales are high this season because work in the salt fields starts and her customers buy at wholesale. Her goal is to have her own house.

loan.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loan.name: Eva Juana

texts.es: La Sra. Eva tiene como actividad el acopio de retazos de tela las cuales posteriormente vende para que las piquen y las vuelvan algodn sinttico para colchones, esta actividad la realiza juntamente con sus hermanas, quienes trabajan por distintas personas que confeccionan ropa y compran las sobras de tela, la Sra. Eva es profesora de nivel primario, y esta actividad es una fuente de ingreso alterna para ella, en esta ocasin solicita financiamiento para la compra de dicha materia prima y poder aumentar su capital de operaciones ya que por esta pocas hay mucha demanda d colchones y ella entrega al por mayor a las fabricas que realizan colchones y almohadas, es una persona muy joven y con muchas ganas de superacin se siente feliz y agradecida con la institucin por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Seora Eva collects remnants of fabric and sells them to people who cut them up and reclaim the synthetic cotton to produce mattresses. She carries out this activity with her sisters, but they work for different people who make clothes and buy leftover fabrics. Eva is an elementary school teacher. Collecting fabrics is an additional source of income to her. Currently she applies for this loan to buy remnants of fabric and increase her working capital, because right now there is a high demand for mattresses, and Eva can sell large quantities of fabrics to the producers of mattresses and pillows. She is very young and eager to succeed. She is happy and grateful for the service provided by her microfinance institution.

loan.use: to buy remnants of fabrics for later resale to producers of mattresses and pillows.

loan.name: Pedro Alberto

texts.es: Pedro de 66 aos de edad y de estado civil viudo, es un hombre que se dedica a la fabricacin de calzado para damas en materiales de cuero y tambin en sinttico. Pedro inici su negocio en el ao 2008, una vez se capacit en marroquinera, donde aprendi todas las tnicas para trabajar con el cuero y todos sus derivados logrando desarrollar su idea emprendedora. As fue como decidi identificar una lnea en la cual lanzarse al mercado y esta fue las sandalias femeninas e infantiles, las cuales distribuye a travs de su hija en la ciudad de Cali y tambin fabrica botas que comercializa en la capital de Colombia, Bogot y que gozan de mucha aceptacin entre sus clientes ubicados en almacenes aledaos, a quienes vista para ofrecerles sus productos. En la actualidad su capital de trabajo es insuficiente, porque su clientela crece y quiere ser siempre oportuno; esta es la razn por la cual acude a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo, con el comprar materias primas, como cueros e insumos como hebillas, pegantes, para fabricar nuevos diseos e impactar a su clientela, que siempre espera de Pedro, lindos modelos para comprarle.
texts.en:
Pedro is a 66 year old widower. He makes womens shoes using leather and synthetics. Pedro started his business in 2008. Once he was trained in leatherwork, and he learned all of the skills for working with leather and it derivatives. He managed to develop his entrepreneurial idea. That is how he decided to select a line to launch in the market. This line was childrens and womens sandals.
He distributes them through his daughter in the city of Cali. He also makes boots that he sells in the capital of Colombia, Bogot. He enjoys great acceptance from his customers in the surrounding stores. He visits them to offer his products.
He currently does not have sufficient working capital. His customers increase, and he needs to always respond quickly. That is why he is requesting a Kiva loan, his first loan with the Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo. He will buy raw materials like leather and supplies like buckles and glue to make new designs and to have an impact on his customers. They always expect to buy beautiful styles from Pedro.

loan.use: to buy raw materials like leather and supplies like buckles and glue.

loan.name: Servando

texts.es: El seor Servando esta solicitando un prstamo para invertir en su negocio de venta de cobijas y cobertores por medio de un catalog, ya que tiene barios pedidos por entregar y no cuenta con el capital necesario para la inversin que desea para su negocio y que sus clientes reciban la mercanca a tiempo y que estn satisfechos. Don Servando a parte de generar ingreso por medio de su negocio; tambin tiene un empleo en una agencia aduanal como repartidor, con estas dos ingreso a podido sacar adelante a su familia y que sus tres hijos tengan el estudio necesario para su futuro.
texts.en: Seor Servando is requesting a loan to invest in his blanket and bedspread catalog sales business as he has several orders to turn in and he doesn't have the necessary capital for the investment. He wants his customers to receive their merchandise on time and he wants them to be satisfied. Don Servando generates part of his income through this business. He also works as a delivery person for a customs agency. With the income from these two jobs he is able to provide for his family and give his three children an education for their future.

loan.use: invest in merchandise for his blanket and bedspread catalog business.

loan.name: Marco Tulio

texts.es: El seor Marco tiene 52 aos de edad, esta casado y vive con sus hijas y su esposa, Marco se a dedicado por mas de 20 aos a la venta de agua en coche en varias comunidades y colonias de San Lorenzo, todos en su hogar trabajan y se ayudan economicamente. el credito lo utilizara para ajustar el capital total para comprar un automovil, el cual lo utilizara para vender agua. Su meta es tener sus carros en buen estado para hacer mejor su trabajo y logar mejores ingresos para su hogar.
texts.en:
Marco is 52 years old, married, and lives with his wife and daughters. For over 20 years, Marco has sold water from his vehicle in various communities and neighborhoods of San Lorenzo. Everyone in his home works and helps out economically.
The loan will help build his fund intended for purchasing a new vehicle, which Marco will use to sell water.
Marco's goal is to keep his vehicles in good condition to improve his efforts and achieve better income for his household.

loan.use: to buy a vehicle for selling water.

loan.name: Irene Elena

texts.es: La seora Irene tiene su taller en su mismo domicilio se dedica a la confeccin de almohadones por cantidad de todo tipo y clase y tambin confecciona muchas potras prendas de vestir como por ejemplo medias para bebes el material para las medias lo hace de la sobra de los almohadones, con el dinero del crdito comprara una maquina pequea de coser para la confeccin de almohadones ella vende por la zona y tambin vende los almohadones en los mercados de la ciudad de La Paz y por la feria 16 de julio de la ciudad de el Alto, La Sra. Irene es casada pero su esposo viaja constantemente por su trabajo ya que es chofer de flotas interdepartamentales, la Sra. Irene es una persona muy trabajadora se siente muy feliz por la oportunidad que le brindan.
texts.en:
Ms. Irene has her workshop in her own home. She devotes herself to manufacturing all types and styles of pillows and cushions in quantity, and she also manufactures many other articles of clothing such as baby socks, which she makes out of the leftover material from the cushions. With the money from the loan she will purchase a small sewing machine for making the cushions. She sells them in her area and also in the markets of the city of La Paz and at the 16 de julio festival in the city of El Alto.
Ms. Irene is married but her husband travels constantly for his work since he is a fleet driver on inter-departmental [long-distance] runs. Ms. Irene is a very hardworking person. She is very happy about the opportunity she is being provided.

loan.use: to purchase a small machine for making pillows.

loan.name: Samuel

texts.es: Daniel, de 31 aos, es un hombre muy veraz y trabajador, vive en su casa propia junto a su hija Ruth de 12 aos quien es el motivo de todos sus esfuerzos. Todas las maanas, desde muy temprano, Daniel sale a trabajar a su chacra, sabe que tiene que poner todo su esfuerzo en hacer ms frtil sus tierras, para poder obtener una buena cosecha. Sus productos, como el cacao, los vende a los centros de acopio de su localidad, donde tiene cuantiosos compradores, debido a la buena calidad de sus cultivos. Lo que ms le gusta de su trabajo es sembrar sus tierras y lo hace con mucha paciencia, lleva 25 aos realizando esta actividad y considera que lo ms difcil es fumigar sus tierras, ya que siempre corre el riesgo de que los productos qumicos le causen alguna enfermedad en lo futuro. En tiempos de cosecha cuenta con el apoyo de los jornaleros para que de esa manera tenga mayor avance en cuanto a su trabajo, con el crdito solicitado comprara abono e insecticidas para combatir las plagas que asechan sus cultivos. Con el tiempo desea comprar nuevas tierras, para aumentar su produccin. Este ser su primer crdito con MFP, por tanto asegura ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Con los 1,000 nuevos soles; comprar abono e insecticidas para combatir la plagas que se apoderan de sus sembros.
texts.en:
Daniel, 31, is a very truthful, hardworking man. He lives in his own house with his 12-year-old daughter Ruth who is the motivating force behind all his efforts. Every morning starting very early Daniel leaves home to work his fields. He knows that he must put all his efforts into making his land more fertile to obtain a good harvest. His products, like cocoa beans, are sold to local gathering centers where he has numerous buyers due to the good quality of his crops.
What he likes best about his work is planting his land, something he does with much patience. Hes been in this line of work for 25 years and considers the fumigating to be the most difficult thing because he always runs the risk of the chemicals causing him some illness in the future. During harvest season, he hires day laborers to advance more quickly with the work. The requested loan is to buy manure and insecticide to combat the infestations that attack his crops. In time, he wants to buy new land to increase production.
This is MFP loan #1. He will be punctual with his payments. He will use the 1000 new soles to buy manure and insecticide to combat the infestations that take over his crops.

loan.use: to buy manure and insecticide.

loan.name: Edith Del Carmen

texts.es: Edith, se dedica a la venta de tortillas, tiene tres hijos de 10, 14 y 16 aos de edad, ella se dedica a la venta de las tortillas desde hace 10 aos, trabaja todos los das de 6:00am a 4:00pm, hasta la fecha no ha tenido problemas con este negocio. Ella est solicitando un prstamo para la compra de quintales de maz, lea y gas, estos materiales son los principales para elaborar las tortillas, este prstamo le ayudara para mejorar el negocio, fortalecerlo con materiales para tenerlos a la mano y pueda as mejorar la produccin. Su aspiracin es que sus hijos finalicen sus estudios, con su apoyo, adems quiere salir bien con el prestamo para tener la oportunidad de solicitar nuevamente.
texts.en:
Edith sells tortillas. She has three children who are 10, 14 and 16 years old. Shes sold tortillas for ten years and works every day from 6am until 4pm; to date shes had no problems with the business.
Shes asking for a loan to buy quintals of corn, firewood and gas which are the main supplies she needs to make tortillas. The loan will help her to improve the business strengthening is with supplies on hand thus improving production. Her hopes are that her children finish their schooling with her support and she also wants to pay back her loan on time so that she is eligible for another one.

loan.use: to buy quintals of corn and to buy firewood and gas.

loan.name: Nectali De Jesus

texts.es: Nectali, es originario de El Regado una comunidad localizada en las afueras de Estel, de oficio agricultor, casado ,tiene 3 hijos. Dentro las actividades de la agricultura el se dedica a la siembra de maz frjol y a la compra venta de ganado. Apenas logro terminar la escuela primaria, pues de dedico a trabajar en las labores del campo desde muy joven junto con su papa. Hace 10 aos empez a trabajar junto con su hermano en la compra y venta de ganado. Pues el vende leche y comercializa en el mercado local de Esteli. El realizo el crdito para compra de ganado. Pues considera que este rubro genera muy buenos ingresos que le ayudaran a salir adelante a su negocio y familia. Es por ello que quiere dedicarse a la especializacin para crianza de ganado de raza.
texts.en:
Nectali is from El Regado a community located in the outskirts of Estel. Hes a farmer. Hes married and has three children. Within the area of farming, he grows corn and beans and also sells livestock. He barely completed elementary school because he started working in the fields with his father when he was very young. Ten years ago he started working with his brother buying and selling cattle. He sells milk in the local market in Estel.
He took out the loan to buy cattle because he considers that this line of work produces very good income that helps him get ahead with his business and his family. This is why he wants to dedicate himself especially to raising purebred cattle.

loan.use: to buy cattle.

loan.name: Ana Julia

texts.es: Ana, vive con sus 3 hijos y su esposo, ella se dedica a atender una pupuseria este negocio surgi por iniciativa propia, trabaja solo por las tardes, tiene experiencia en el negocio, ya que lleva varios aos realizando las pupusas. Actualmente est solicitando un prstamo para la compra de maz, quesillo, aceite, lea, condimentos, que son los insumos para preparar las pupusas, este prstamo le dar mayor seguridad para la generacin de la venta, ya que contara con la seguridad de los materiales que necesita para realizar las pupusas. El objetivo de Ana es tener un negocio ms amplio, que pueda tambin ofrecer a su familia una mejor condicin y mayor estabilidad econmica.
texts.en:
Ana lives with her three children and her husband. She runs a pupusa [grilled stuffed corn cakes] shop that arose out of her own initiative. She only works afternoons and has experience in the business since shes been making pupusas for several years.
She is currently asking for a loan to buy corn, cheese, oil, firewood and condiments which are the main supplies needed to make pupusas. This loan will give her more security to generate sales since she will have all the necessary materials to make pupusas on hand.
Anas objective is to have a larger business that will also offer her family better conditions and more economic stability.

loan.use: to buy corn, cheese, oil, firewood and condiments.

loan.name: Placida Rosa

texts.es: La seora Placida mas conocida como "Pacesa" por sus familiares y conocidos, vive con su hijo la zona de alto Pampahasi. Ella se dedica a la venta de chuo, tunta y mote remojado en uno de los mercados en la zona de Pampahasi a veinte minutos del centro de la cuidad. Tambin adems vende artculos de limpieza, como ser colinos dentales, cepillos, jabones y otros. Ella sale todos los das a vender y tiene un problema en su cadera que le impide caminar correctamente, pero con la ayuda de sus familiares continua todos los das con sus actividades. Ella es cliente antigua de emprender y siempre realiza sus pagos de manera puntual, en esta oportunidad solicita el prstamo de dinero para el incremento de su capital con la compra de tunta, chuo, mote y productos de limpieza, se siente feliz y agradecida por la oportunidad que le brindan ya que gracias a su apoyo su negocio creci. En la foto se encuentra en compaa de su hermana.
texts.en:
Placida, better known as Pacesa by her friends and family, lives with her son in the Alto Pampahasi zone. She sells chuo, tunta [types of dehydrated potatoes] and mote [grains soaked in water] in one of Pampahasis markets located twenty minutes from city center. She also sells various cleaning supplies like tooth paste, brushes, soap and others. She goes out daily to sell but has a problem with her hip that keeps her from being able to walk correctly but with help from family members continues daily with her activities.
She is a longstanding Emprender client and always makes her payments punctually. On this occasion shes asking for the loan to increase working capital buying more tunta, chuo, mote and cleaning supplies. She feels happy and grateful for the opportunity shes being given because thanks to your support her business grew. In the photo she appears in company of her sister.

loan.use: to buy dehydrated potato, corn and detergent.

loan.name: Alberta

texts.es: Alberta, de 30 aos es una mujer sociable y trabajadora, vive en su propia casa junto a sus 04 queridos hijos, quienes son el impulso de todos sus esfuerzos. Los verdes campos del poblado, ubicado en la selva baja, han sido en la vida de Alberta un lugar muy agradable para trabajar, desde muy pequea sus padres le ensearon a cultivar caf, y ahora ella tiene sus propias tierras en las que trabaja con mucho esmero y sacrificio. Lo que ms le gusta de su trabajo es cosechar sus tierras, ya que as ve la calidad de sus frutos. Lleva 14 aos realizando esta actividad y considera que lo ms difcil es transportar sus cultivos desde su comunidad hasta los centros de acopio situado en la ciudad de San Francisco. Con el tiempo, espera juntar el dinero suficiente para comprar nuevas tierras. Este ser el crdito nmero 08 con MFP, sabe que tiene la responsabilidad de pagar todas sus cuotas puntualmente y est dispuesta a hacerlo. En su banco comunal es una socia que pone el orden a todo el grupo. Con los 1,000 nuevos soles; le servir para comprar plantas de caf y poder incrementarsu produccin.
texts.en:
Alberta, 30, is a sociable, hardworking woman living in her own house with her beloved four children who are the motivating factors behind all her efforts. The green fields in her community which is located in the low jungle have been a very pleasant place for Alberta to work in her life.
Since childhood her parents taught her to farm coffee and now she has her own lands that she works with much dedication and sacrifice. What she likes most about her work is cultivating the land because thats how she sees the fruits of her labor. Shes been in this line of work for 14 years and considers the most difficult part having to transport her crops from her community to the gathering centers located in the city of San Francisco. In time, she hopes to save enough money to buy new land.
This will be MFP loan #8. Shes aware that she must make all her installment payments punctually and is determined to do so. Shes the member of the communal bank who imposes order on the entire group. The 1000 new soles will be used to buy coffee plants to be able to increase production.

loan.use: to buy coffee plants.

loan.name: Sandra Yanira

texts.es: Sandra, vive con su familia, con sus padres y hermanos, est soltera, no tiene hijos, en su familia toda trabajan y contribuyen para los gastos del hogar, Sandra por su parte se dedica a la crianza de cerdos y ademas es empleada, recabando datos de los habitantes de la zona rural, para la ayuda que el gobierno les envia, su negocio lo inicio con sus padres. Actualmente solicita un prstamo para la compra de cerdos, ya que quiere aumentar el negocio en su granja, esta compra le ayudara mucho, permitindole crecer y que a futuro tenga una mayor posibilidad de generar ganancias. Su objetivo es ser una comerciante con experiencia, que pueda pagar este prstamo de la mejor manera, apoyar a sus padres y generar mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en: Sandra lives with her family, parents and siblings, is single and has no children. Everyone in her family works to help with household expenses, and Sandra does her part by raising pigs. She also has a job gathering data from rural areas, for government assistance. Her parents started her business. She now seeks credit to buy pigs in order to increase production on her farm. This credit will help her to grow, achieve a better future and to increase her earnings. Her goal is to become an experienced businesswoman, pay back this credit on time, support her parents and improve her living standards.

loan.use: to buy pigs

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy fruit and vegetables

loan.name: Natividad

texts.es: La seora Natividad se dedica al comercio, vende ropa, blusas, jarras y baeras de plstico tambin costura almohadas y las comercializa de forma ambulante en las distintas provincias de la ciudad de Cochabamba como ser: Valle Grande, Omereque, Comarapa; con el dinero del crdito comprar esponja y tela para la confeccin de almohadas vive en casa propia ubicada en el sud de la ciudad en la zona Sebastin Pagador; su familia esta conformada por su esposo quien se encuentra trabajando en Santa Cruz y sus 2 hijos dependientes que se encuentran estudiando, la Sra. Natividad se dedica a su trabajo y tambin a la educacin de sus hijos sola, ya que su esposo no esta con ella, aunque siempre manda dinero para ayudar con los gastos del hogar.
texts.en: Natividad sells clothing, blouses, jars, plastic items and sewn pillows which she sells in different provinces of Cochabamba such as: Valle Grande, Omereque, Comarapa; with this credit she plans to buy material and stuffing for pillows. She lives in her own home south of the city, in the Sebastin Pagador neighborhood. Her family includes her husband, who works in Santa Cruz and 2 dependent children, who are studying. Natividad is dedicated to her work and to her children's education, as her husband is not with her but always sends money to help with household expenses.

loan.use: to buy material and stuffing for pillows

loan.name: Sandro Alexander

texts.es:
Sandro Alexander en todo un luchador, tiene 36 aos de edad y vive en la ciudad de Ica, Per, Sandro es muy carismticos, en sus tiempos libres disfruta de escuchar msica ya que nos comenta que le ayuda despejarse de los problemas o cuando se encuentra de mal humor, le gusta mucho un platillo tpico de nuestro pas llamado Aj de Gallina, (consiste en el pollo desmenuzado el cual se cocina en un aderezo base de aj amarillo licuado, pan humedecido en leche), Sandro solo pudo estudiar hasta quinto de secundaria debido a los pocos recursos econmicos de sus padre y desde joven tuvo la necesidad de trabajar para poder apoyarlos; pero le hubiera gustado estudiar Mecnica Automotriz.
Sandro trabaja conduciendo una mototaxi, realiza esta labor alrededor de 10 horas diarias, con mucho esfuerzo, en especial en esta temporada de verano, donde el calor es muy sofocante,el cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy respetuoso con sus clientes y porque hay mucha necesidad de parte de los pobladores por movilizarse.
Sandro est muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a su apoyo el podr realizar los trmites para obtener su licencia de conducir, con ello podr brindarle mayor seguridad a sus clientes y evitar que tengan infracciones de parte de la autoridad policial y as tener ms ingresos para ahorrar y cumplir su gran sueo:Tener una mototaxi propia ya que actualmente la que conduce es alquilada
texts.en:
Sandro Alexander is a fighter. He is 36 years old and lives in the city of Ica, Peru. Sandro is very charismatic. In his free time he enjoys listening to music because, as he tells us, it helps him clear his mind of problems, or when he is in a bad mood. He very much likes a typical dish of our country called Aj de Gallina [spicy pepper chicken] (shredded chicken cooked in a sauce made of yellow pepper liquefied with milk-soaked bread). Sandro was only able to study up to the fifth year of secondary school because of his parents' limited economic resources, and from a young age he needed to work to be able to help them, but he would have enjoyed studying auto mechanics.
Sandro works driving a motorcycle taxi. He does this job about ten hours a day, with great effort, especially in this summer season when the heat is suffocating. He believes that it is going well for him in his business because he is very respectful with his customers and because there is a lot of need for the residents to get around.
Sandro is very grateful to the Kiva lenders because thanks to their support he will be able to fulfill the procedures to get his driver's license, with which he will be able to give his customers greater security and avoid infractions from the police authorities. In this way he will have more income to save and achieve his biggest dream, to have his own motorcycle taxi because the one he currently drives is rented.

loan.use: to get his driver's license.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy pigs.

loan.name: Aida Esperanza

texts.es: la sra. Ada tiene 67 aos de edad, sus hijos todos son mayores y tienen sus propias familias y trabajos. Aida se dedica al comercio, cuenta con un negocio de venta de productos lcteos, carnes y embutidos. Aida tiene varios aos de dedicarse a este tipo de actividad, la cual ha sido la fuente principal de generacin de ingresos y le ha permitido salir adelante. su negocio esta ubicado en la calle principal del Barrio, esa zona es conocida como la calle del comercio por la influencia comercial en El Municipio de Trojes, por ahi circulan muchas personas de diferentes aldeas y caseros. La Sra. Aida es muy conocida en la zona por ser una mujer de buenas costumbres. el credito lo utilizara para la compra de lacteos, carnes y embutidos.
texts.en: Ada is 67 years old and all her children are adults and have their own families and Jobs. Ada is a merchant. She has a business selling dairy products, meats and cured meats. Shes been in this type of work for many years and its been her main source of income that has allowed her to get ahead. Her business is located on one of the neighborhoods main streets. That area is known as the commercial street because of the commercial influence in the Municipality of Trojes; many people from various villages and hamlets pass through there. Ada is very well known in the area because shes a woman of very good customs. She will use the loan to buy dairy products, meat and cured meats.

loan.use: to buy dairy products, meats and cured meats.

loan.name: Alberto

texts.es: Alberto tiene 39 aos, es un hombre muy alegre y luchador, vive en su propia casa junto a sus 04 queridos hijos, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. Alberto, es un hombre de mucho lucro, se dedica con mucho esmero a la labor que realiza. Su trabajo consiste en labrar la tierra, es campesino y siembra plantas de de caf. Tiene ms de 20 aos ejerciendo sta actividad, asimismo contrata peones para que lo ayuden en la cosecha, de esa manera extrae rpido los frutos. Su productos son comercializados a las empresas acopiadoras, quienes le remuneran muy bien por cada kilogramo de cada producto que vende. Considera que lo ms difcil es transportar sus productos desde la chacra hasta los centros de acopio situado en la ciudad de San Francisco. Pero ahora lo que ms prioriza es comprar nuevas tierras para ampliar sus sembros y aumentar su produccin. Para as darle una buena estabilidad econmica a su familia. Este es el crdito nmero 01 con MFP, est dispuesto a pagar todas sus cuotas puntualmente, ya que desea acceder a otro crdito ms adelante. Con los 1,500 nuevos soles, contratar peones para que le apoyen en el desmonte de maleza que aquejan sus plantas.
texts.en:
Alberto, 39, is a cheerful, tenacious man living in his own house with his four beloved children that he wants to provide a better quality of life for. Alberto is a very productive man; he is very dedicated to the work he does. His work consists in tilling the soil; hes a coffee farmer. Hes been in this line of work for more than 20 years and hires day laborers to help him with harvesting so that he can extract the fruit more quickly. He sells his production to gathering firms who pay well for each kilogram of product that he sells. He considers the most difficult part of the job having to transport his products from his fields to the gathering centers located in the city of San Francisco. For now, his main priority is to buy new land to expand his fields and increase production to provide his family with good economic stability.
This is his first MFI loan and hes willing prepared to make all his installment payments punctually because hed like to access a future loan later on. He will use the 1500 new soles to hire day workers to help him remove weeds that are encroaching on his plants.

loan.use: to hire day laborers.

loan.name: Yesenia Patricia

texts.es: Yesenia Patricia tiene 29 aos de edad, la actividad econmica a la que se dedica es a la venta de comida esta actividad la realiza en el campo en su comunidad , este negocio lo aprendi por una hermana y por la necesidad de generar ingreso a la familia y brindarle lo mejor. Yesenia est solicitando crdito para comprar granos bsicos y carne para la elaboracin de la comida entre otros productos.
texts.en: Yesenia Patricia, 29, sells food, an activity she carries out in the countryside in her community. She learned this business from her sister and because she wanted to provide income for her family and the best for them. Yesenia is asking for a loan to buy basic grains and meat among other products to prepare her food.

loan.use: to buy basic grains and meat.

loan.name: Margoth Carmita

texts.es:
Margoth es una mujer de xito con un gran futuro, es muy responsable y le gusta ayudar a las personas que necesitan especialmente las que estan enfermas, es por eso que su negocio es una farmacia. Margoth tiene 34 aos, es soltera y vive con su hijo de 2 meses de edad en Pimampiro que se encuentra a 45 minutos de Ibarra en la Provincia de Imbabura.
Margoth trabaja en su farmacia desde muy jven para ayudar a los dems. Es el primer crdito que solicita a Fodemi el mismo que va a ser invertido en la compra de medicinas e implementos farmacuticos para incrementar el stock de su farmacia y para poder brindar a la poblacin mayor variedad de medicamentos. Esta inversin permitir a margoth obtener mejores ingresos y poder darle el sustento a su hijo.
El sueo de Margoth es poder ampliar su farmacia para poder ofrecer empleo a las personas que lo necesiten.
En la fotografa Margoth est con blusa celeste, alegre de atender a su clienta.
texts.en:
Margoth is a successful mother with a great future. Shes very responsible and likes to help people who need it especially those who are ill; this is why her business is a pharmacy. Margoth is 34 years old, single and lives with her two-month-old son in Pimampiro which is located 45 minutes from Ibarra in Imbabura Province.
Margoth has been working in her pharmacy since she was young to help others. This is the first loan shes requested from Fodemi and it will be used to buy medicine and pharmaceutical supplies to increase stock in her pharmacy to provide the population a greater variety of medicines. This investment will allow Margoth to obtain improved income and support her son.
Margoths dream is to be able to expand the pharmacy to be able to provide employment to people who need it. In the photo, Margoth is wearing the light blue blouse happily taking care of her customer.

loan.use: to buy medicine and pharmaceutical supplies.

loan.name: Magdalena

texts.es: Magdalena, se dedica a la crianza de pollos y administra un comedor, vive con su esposo y dos hijos, ella inicio a administrar los negocios con el apoyo de su esposo, trabaja en su casa, no tiene un horario fijo para realizar sus labores. Actualmente est solicitando un prstamo para la compra de pollos pequeos y concentrado para alimentarlos, este prstamo le ayudara para mejorar la granja, amplindola con la compra de ms pollos. La aspiracin de Magdalena es que este prstamo cubra sus expectativas, mejorando el negocio y su condicin como comerciante.
texts.en: Magdalena raises chicks and runs an eatery. She lives with her husband and two children. She started to run the businesses with support from her husband. She works at home and does not have a fixed work schedule. She is currently asking for a loan to buy chicks and feed concentrate for them. This loan will help her improve the farm expanding it with the purchase of more chicks. Magdalenas hope is that the loan will meet her expectations improving the business and her condition as a merchant.

loan.use: to buy chicks and feed concentrate.

loan.name: Los Girasoles Group

texts.es:
El Grupo los girasoles esta integrado por 10 mujeres muy alegres, amables y trabajadoras las cuales a diario luchan para sacar adelante a su familia y poder ofrecer un mejor futuro a sus hijos. Este grupo esta ubicado en una zona caera ya que en esta comunidad se encuentra uno de los ingenios productores de azucar mas importantes de la region y es la principal fuente de empleo.
La seora Sara es uno de los miembros de este grupo, ella tiene la edad de 39 aos estudio hasta el tercer grado de secundaria y esta casada con el seor Mariano, ellos tienen 3 hijos de los cuales dos ya trabajan y el menor de nombre Erick estudia la secundaria. Doa Sara nos platica que siempre a trabajado para ayudar a su esposo a sacar a delante a su familia ya que desefortundamente su esposo esta un poco enfermo, Ella desde hace un poco mas de 2 aos inicio a vender pollo, primero vendia en el parque pero ahora vende desde su casa en un pequeo local que mando a construir, tambien nos platica que como ya tiene tiempo vendiando ya tiene sus clientes y vende muy bien, ella dice que esta contenta porque su esposo la apoya despachando y aliniendo los pollos. Doa Sara necesita este credito para invertirlo en la compra de mas pollos para continuar con sus ventas. ella desea que con este credito su negocio continue progresando ya que quiere sacar a delante a su familia y tener un mejor futuro.
Las seoras que integran este grupo agradecen a la fundacion por la confiansa y el prestamo que le otorgara.
los demas integrantes son:
Galdina venta de zapatos Rosalina venta de ropa Paula venta de cosmeticos Rosa venta de refrescos Irene cria de ganado Josefina carniceria aracely venta de cosmeticos Luisa venta de ropa julia venta de refrescos
texts.en:
The Los Girasoles (Sunflowers) group is composed of ten very cheerful, kind and hardworking women who daily strive to move their families forward and to be able to offer their children a better future. This group is located in a sugar cane producing area. One of the most important sugar cane plantations in the region is located here and is the main source of employment.
Sara is one of the group members. Shes 39 years old and studied up to third grade of secondary school. Shes married to Mariano and they have three children two of which already work; the youngest is called Erick and hes attending secondary school.
Sara relates that shes always worked to help her husband support the family because unfortunately her husband isnt in the best health. For about a little more than two years now shes been selling chicken.
At first she sold it in the park but now sells it from home in a small locale she had built. She also relates to us that since shes now been selling for some time she has an established clientele and her sales are good. She says shes happy because her husband helps her tend to customers and butcher the chickens.
Sara needs this loan to buy more chickens to continue with her sales. She hopes that with this loan her business will continue to make progress since she wants to move her family forward and to have a better future.
The women who are members of this group thank the Fundacin for the trust and the loan its granted them.
The other members are:
Galdina shoe sales Rosalina clothing sales Paula cosmetics sales Rosa soft-drinks sales Irene raising livestock Josefina butcher shop Aracely cosmetics sales Luisa clothing sales Julia soft-drinks sales.

loan.use: to buy chickens.

loan.name: Aydee

texts.es: Haydee, de 28 aos de edad, es una mujer sencilla y muy trabajadora, esta casada con Edison de 30 aos y tienen 03 hijos en etapa escolar y juntos residen en su propia morada donde reina la armona. Haydee trabaja arduamente desde hace 13 aos se dedica a la venta de abarrotes. Con sus ahorros acumulados abri una tienda en donde ofrece variedad de productos de primera necesidad. Su negocio le genera buenas ganancias econmicas,y cada da ella desde muy temprano lo abre en espera de sus primeros compradores. Menciona que la clave de captar consumidores es atender amablemente y apoyarlos en sus compras. Lo que ms le gusta de su trabajo es quedar bien con sus clientes, ya lleva seis aos en este negocio y considera que lo ms difcil es tener que permanecer de pie todo el transcurso del da. En su negocio le va muy bien ya que gracias a ello pudo adquirir mas terreno para cultivar, siendo su esposo quien lo trabaja. Con el tiempo, espera poder ampliar su vivienda y as agrandar su bodega. Este es el crdito nmero 06 con MFP, esta muy contenta de saber que contar una vez ms con el apoyo de los financistas para seguir creciendo. En su banco comunal es una socia participe y muy puntual en las reuniones. Con los 3,000 nuevos soles, comprar mercadera como: sacos de arroz, azcar, aceites, detergentes, etc.
texts.en:
Haydee, 28, is an unassuming, very hardworking woman who is married to Edison, 30; they have three school age children and they live together in their own house where harmony reigns.
Haydee has been working hard for 13 years selling groceries. She used her accumulated savings to open a store where she sells a variety of basic staple items. Her business generates good economic profits and every day she opens up expecting her first buyers.
She mentions that the key to capturing customers is to tend to them kindly and support their purchases. What she most likes about her work is to satisfy her customers. Shes been in business six years and considers the most difficult part of it to have to remain standing all day. She does well in her business because thanks to it she was able to buy more farmland for her husband to work. In time she hopes to be able to enlarger her house as well as her store.
This is MFP loan #6 and she is very happy to know that she can once again count on support from lenders to continue growing. She is a very participative, punctual member of her communal banks meetings. She will use the 3000 new soles to buy merchandise like sacks of rice, sugar, oil, detergent, etc.

loan.use: to buy sacks of rice, sugar, oil and detergent.

loan.name: Blanca

texts.es: Blanca tiene 23 aos, es una joven muy amable y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia y desea tener un buen futuro. Todos los das desde muy temprano abre su tienda de abarrotes para atender a sus vecinos, ella es una vendedora muy hbil, sabe como tratarlos y siempre los termina convenciendo de comprar algo ms. Su tienda esta muy bien surtida de productos de primera necesidad tales como arroz, leche, variedad de cereales y menestras ya que siempre se preocupa por comprar los productos ms consumidos. Lo que ms le gusta de su trabajo es conversar con sus clientes y enterarse de las cosas que suceden en su entorno vecinal. Lleva 03 aos realizando esta actividad y considera que lo ms difcil es tener que permanecer de pie todo el lapso del da. Para el bien de sus ingresos econmicos ms adelante espera ampliar las instalaciones de su tienda, para poder vender ms productos. Este es el crdito nmero 03 con MFP, se siente muy contenta de saber que tendr un apoyo financiero, ya que as se sentir segura de comprar lo solicitado y esta dispuesta a devolver puntualmente los pagos programados. Con los 2,000 nuevos soles, comprar ms sacos de arroz, azcar conservas y entre otros productos.
texts.en:
Blanca is 23 years old. She is a cheerful, hard-working young woman who lives in her own house and wants a good future. She opens her grocery store very early every day to wait on her neighbors. She is a highly skilled saleswoman as she knows how to treat her customers and she always convinces them to buy more. Her store is very well-stocked with basic necessity products such as rice, milk, assorted grains and beans as she is always concerned with buying the most frequently consumed products. Her favorite part of her job is conversing with her customers and finding out what is going on in the neighborhood. She has been running this business for 3 years and considers standing on her feet all day the hardest part. For the sake of her future income she hopes to expand her store so she can sell more products.
This is her third loan with MFP and she is very happy to know that she will have financial support. She feels secure buying with what she has requested and is committed to making her payments on time. With the 2,000 nuevos soles [Peruvian currency] she will buy more sacks of rice, sugar, canned foods and other products.

loan.use: buy more sacks of rice, sugar, canned foods and other products.

loan.name: Magda Patricia

texts.es: la sra Magda Patricia tiene 41 aos de edad, es madre soltera y tiene 2 hijos los que estudian en centro educativo pblicos de su comunidad, Magda se dedica brindar servicios de consulta medica, ella es medico general, contando con mas de 6 aos de experiencia. su negocio se ubica en una de las calles del comercio, este negocio le genera utilidades para satisfacer gastos familiares y compromisos adquiridos. la Dra. Magda es una persona muy reconocida en el municipio ya que ha formado parte de la corporacin municipal y por su don de servicio a la comunidad en pro del bienestar y de la salud de los ms desprotegidos. El credito lo utilizara para la compra de medicamentos y as satisfacer la demanda de sus pacientes.
texts.en:
Magda Patricia, 41, is a single mother with two children enrolled in public school.
Magda is a general practitioner with more than six years' experience. Her business is located on one of the main streets. Thanks to her business, she generates enough income to cover household and other expenses.
Magda is very well-known in her town for her service in favor of the well-being and health of people in need. She was also a member of the municipal council.
She is requesting this loan to buy medicines in order to meet her patient's demands.

loan.use: to buy medicine.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy general merchandise.

loan.name: Claudia Leticia

texts.es: la joven sra. Claudia tiene 25 aos de edad, vive en unin libre y tiene 2 hijos. Claudia se dedica al comercio, cuenta con una tienda de venta de ropa y calzado, tiene mas de 3 aos de dedicarse a este tipo de actividad, su negocio esta ubicado en la calle del comercio, lugar muy estratgico en donde transitan muchas personas de diferentes aldeas y caseros, lo que le permite tener una muy buena clientela, El credito lo utilizara para la compra de ropa y zapatos. las ganancias las necesita para salir adelante con su familia. su meta es graduar a sus hijos para que sean buenos profesionales.
texts.en:
Claudia, 25, lives in a common law marriage and has two sons.
Claudia has been working as a retailer for more than three years. She has a clothes and shoe shop located in the main street, a very busy place where people of different village and farmhouses go to. Therefore, she has a great clientele.
She uses her income to provide for her family. Her dream is to have her sons graduate in order to become good professionals.

loan.use: to buy clothes and shoes.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy jeans, blouses, T-shirts, and sweaters, because they are in demand, and because she needs to have a greater variety of clothing to sell

loan.name: Cirila

texts.es: Cirila, de 39 aos, es una mujer alegre y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia junto a su pareja Alberto de 40 aos y sus 04 queridos hijos, quienes son el principal motivo de todos sus esfuerzos. Los productos que con tanta voluntad y entrega han logrado cultivar Cirila y su esposo, le han ayudado mucho en el progreso de su vida. Todas las maanas empieza a trabajar en sus tierras, ya que sabe que del cuidado que le brinde a sus sembros de cacao y caf y achiotes, depender la calidad y el precio que obtenga. Lo que ms le gusta de su trabajo es cuidar sus cultivos y se siente muy feliz cuando los ve grandes y frondosos, lleva 20 aos realizando esta actividad y considera que lo ms difcil, es transportar los pesados sacos de los productos hasta la ciudad de San Francisco, lugar donde recibe mejores precios por sus granos. Ms adelante, espera sembrar ms plantas de cacao ya que cuenta con espacios sin cultivar. Este es el crdito nmero 01 con MFP, se siente feliz por contar con el apoyo de los financistas ya que gracias al apoyo de ellos esta prosperando. Cirila en esta oportunidad tambin espera beneficiarse con el crdito por lo cual ella esta dispuesta a devolver puntualmente sus cuotas. Con los 1,500 nuevos soles, contratar peones para que le apoyen en el desmonte y cosechas de sus productos.
texts.en:
Cirila, 39, is a cheerful and hardworking woman. She lives in her own home along with her partner Alberto, 40, and their four dear children who are the primary reason for all their efforts. The products that Cirila and her husband have grown successfully with so much willpower and commitment have helped them considerably in their lives' progress. Each morning she begins working on her land since she knows that the care she gives her cocoa, coffee and annatto seedlings will determine the quality and price she obtains for them. What she enjoys most about her work is caring for her crops and she feels very happy when she sees them large and leafy. She has been in this business for 20 years and believes the most difficult part is transporting the heavy sacks of product to the city of San Francisco [Peru], the place where she receives the best prices for her beans and seeds. Down the road she hopes to plant more cocoa plants since she has some uncultivated areas.
This is her first loan with MFP. She is happy to have the support of the lenders since, thanks to their support, she is prospering. Cirila also hopes to receive a benefit with the loan this time and so she is willing to make her payments punctually. With the 1,500 Peruvian soles she will hire day laborers to help her with clearing the land and harvesting her products.

loan.use: to hire day laborers.

loan.name: Dario

texts.es: El seor Daro es una persona responsable y honesta que desde pequeo tuvo su ilusin de tener un negocio donde el pudiera tomar sus propias decisiones. Hace nueve aos tuvo la oportunidad de comprar equipos de cmputo para iniciar su negocio de cibercaf que se ubica desde su domicilio. Ofrece internet, msica, copias, algunos artculos de oficina y mas. Para Dario es muy importante tener sus equipos en buenas condiciones por lo que quiere comprar otro equipo nuevo que tenga la mejor procesador, de esta manera ofrecer a su cliente mejor servicio y obtendr mayores ingresos.
texts.en: Daro is a responsible and honest person who since he was young wished to have a business where he could make his own decisions. Nine years ago he had the opportunity to buy computer equipment to start his internet cafe business that is located in his home. He offers Internet, music, copies, some office supplies, and more. For Daro it is very important to have his equipment in good condition, so he wants to buy new equipment that has the best processor. In this way he will offer his customers better service and he will have a better income.

loan.use: to buy computer equipment.

loan.name: Demetria

texts.es: Demetria, de 30 aos, es una mujer amable, sencilla y sobre todo muy trabajadora, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Aurelio de 31 aos y su querido hijo Jack de 09 aos, a quien desea brindar un mejor futuro. La tienda de abarrotes de Demetria es una de las ms concurridasde su localidad. El gran carisma que posee y la amabilidad en su trato, han hecho que sea la preferida por sus vecinos, quienes no dudan en hacer sus compras desde muy temprano, ya que saben que es la primera tienda en abrirse y la ultima en cerrarse. Lo que ms le gusta de su trabajo es aconsejar a sus consumidores sobre la calidad y variedad de cada producto, lleva 10 aos en esta actividad y considera que lo ms difcil es tener que permanecer todo el da dentro de su tienda en espera de clientes ya que de eso depende sus ingresos econmicos. Gracias al negocio que posee ha logrado comprar variedad de bienes para su hogar. Este es el crdito nmero 01 con MFP, esta muy contenta de saber que contar una vez ms con el apoyo de los financistas para seguir prosperando.
